list.desc: Si dice che esistesse un grande albero le cui radici si estendevano in ogni angolo del mondo, e si dice anche che questo ramo ne facesse parte. È come se non fosse stato staccato e portato molto lontano, dato che la sua vitalità è tale che ancora vi germogliano foglie nuove.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Ramo geomantico secco
list.desc: Fragili rami provenienti dalle profondità della terra. Anche dopo anni d'invecchiamento, sotto la superficie screziata è possibile vedere che i loro poteri non sono andati persi del tutto.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Foglie geomantiche secche
list.desc: Un ramoscello proveniente dalle profondità della terra. Sebbene sia lontano da dove giaceva un tempo, le sue foglie pulsano ancora d'energia.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Gemma di topazio Prithiva
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione personaggi.
"Tutte le monete che scorrono su questa terra sono il mio sangue e la mia carne.
Così sono diventato il garante del duro lavoro, della saggezza e del futuro della gente.
Questa è la fiducia che ho riposto in loro. Tradiscila, e sporcherai il mio sangue."

list.name: Pezzo di topazio Prithiva
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione personaggi.
"Tutte le monete che scorrono su questa terra sono il mio sangue e la mia carne.

Così sono diventato il garante del duro lavoro, della saggezza e del futuro della gente."

list.name: Frammento di topazio Prithiva
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione personaggi.
"Tutte le monete che scorrono su questa terra sono il mio sangue e la mia carne."

list.name: Scheggia di topazio Prithiva
list.desc: Materiale d'scensione personaggi.

list.name: Legno di cedro profumato
list.desc:
Wood from the Cedar tree. Also known as the "Fragrant Cedar" for the aromatic oils it contains.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Magazzino del maniero Riserve presenti
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Storehouse: We Have Reserves.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Ricevimento del maniero Professionalità
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Reception: Prim and Proper.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Angolo della parete del maniero Palizzata della città antica
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Wall Corner: Old City Palisade.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Ingresso del maniero Porte del vento
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Gate: Windy Doors.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Angolo del cortile del maniero Armonia misurata
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Courtyard Corner: Measured Harmony.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Corridoio del maniero Avanti senza fretta
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Corridor: Onward With Ease.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Muro del cortile del maniero Protezione di pietra
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Courtyard Wall: Stoneguard.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Muro del cortile del maniero Confine nascosto
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Courtyard Wall: Hidden Boundary.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Muro del cortile del maniero Angolo dell'armonia
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Estate Courtyard Wall: Harmonious Corner.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Pancetta
list.desc: Smoked strips of pork. Crispy with a bit of fat, but not too greasy. Mmmmm... bacon.

list.name: Melonlavanda
list.desc: Un frutto dal colore vivace. Se cucinata, la sua polpa si trasforma in pietanze dal sapore unico per il palato.

list.name: Cecilia
list.desc:
Un fiore dall'aspetto incantevole che cresce solo nei luoghi dove soffiano i venti forti.

Intangibile come il cuore puro di un'anima libera.

list.name: Emblema del sergente
list.desc: Un emblema con una forma differente per distinguere i sergenti dalle nuove reclute. Forse ci sono delle emozioni complesse dietro.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Gemma dell'armatura
list.desc: A jewel that fell from the armor of a special Shadowy Husk after you defeated it. You can feel a will surging within it. Perhaps it might be more correct to say that this will manifested itself through the armor rather than manipulated it.

list.name: Pesce del Festival d'estate
list.desc: La specialità di Yoimiya. Guardare i fuochi d'artificio, avere le mani piene di snack che ti ha dato Yoimiya, sentire la sua risata spensierata e infantile mentre i fuochi d'artificio scoppiano in cielo... Nel mezzo di questa sinfonia unica di suoni, il grassoccio pesce dorato nelle tue mani sembra quasi potersi mettere a nuotare da un momento all'altro...

list.name: Cabochon dimensionale In pieno volo
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Sub-Space Cabochon: In Soaring Flight.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: A non finire
list.desc: A snack grilled on an iron plate. Water is added to flour and stirred into a slurry, vegetables and meat are added, and the mix is grilled well on an iron plate before taking on a splash of sauce and a sprinkle of dried bonito flakes. This tastes delicious no matter how many ingredients one adds, and indeed it makes people feel like "the more ingredients, the merrier," hence the dish's name.

list.name: Giada nottilucosa
list.desc: Un minerale raro che brilla al buio. Si dice che sia una gemma mutata dalla condensa degli elementi del mondo.

list.name: Campione di Giada nottilucosa
list.desc:
A small sample that has been sliced off in order to help you select the Noctilucous Jade you will be using to make implements for the Rite of Parting.
An ancient Liyue proverb goes: "Noctilucous Jade shines brightest in the flames," meaning that high-quality Noctilucous Jade will shine with a bright and pure azure light when exposed to high temperatures. It has also come to symbolize heroes showing their true mettle in times of crisis.

list.name: Statuetta oscura
list.desc:
An idol made in the likeness of some unknown, one-eyed person.
You can feel a strange warmth emanating from within as you hold onto it, like the shoulder of a dear friend. Perhaps this icon can indeed give people who understand its significance the courage to carry on.

list.name: Grantè
list.desc: Tea from Liyue. After a grueling trek around the vast region of Liyue, there's nothing more rejuvenating than a big swig of tea from Pop's Teas.

list.name: Ingegno dell'eroe
list.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

list.name: Frutto Amakumo
list.desc: Il frutto dell'Erba Amakumo, che cresce sull'Isola di Seirai. Appoggiandolo al tuo orecchio, puoi sentirlo crepitare di una lieve energia.

list.name: Carne di Tianshu
list.desc: A braised meat dish. The cut of meat used is a happy medium between lean and fatty, and has been braised to smoking perfection. The ingredients glisten, and are soft but not greasy. Word has it that the Tianshu of a certain generation of the Liyue Qixing invented this dish after much painstaking development.

list.name: Le vicende di Tianheng
list.desc: A poetry collection by Pingshan, The Mystic. The quality of the poems is all over the place, but it has long been a reference book for young poets or poet-wannabes in Liyue.

list.name: Documento ufficiale della Commissione Tenryou
list.desc: Obtained from Kujou Takayuki. None are privy to these contents save him and the Shogun — or so they tell you. It has the seal of the Kujou Clan Head on it.

list.name: Lettera segreta della Commissione Tenryou
list.desc: Obtained from Kujou Takayuki. The contents are a bit ambiguous, but it isn't difficult to see that some of it involves an exchange of intelligence with the Fatui.

list.name: Tecnica anti-vertigini 2.0
list.desc: Sayu's specialty. The Onigiri has been kneaded by Sayu into a cutesy shape — but remember, it's a mujina, not a tanuki, got it? And now that you mention it, this must be how Sayu can sleep for a whole day after eating, right?

list.name: Conchiglia misteriosa
list.desc: A conch, but there's something strange about it. What could it be for?

list.name: Foto di una strana roccia
list.desc: You took this picture of a strange rock that can be seen on the walls of The Chasm. You do not know what the patterns on the rock mean, but perhaps it could be of value to some researchers.

list.name: Stratosferico del Ludi sospetto
list.desc: A rich, meaty dish. The meat must have been stacked wrong... Yeah, that's it. Now, can this actually be served...?

list.name: Dango tricolori sospetti
list.desc: A soft, glutinous snack. One suspects a lack of water used in the cooking process as the culprit in the cracks all over this dish. Don't force it down your throat, or you might just choke...

list.name: Chop suey di Zhongyuan sospetto
list.desc: A seasoned and cooked meat dish. Even if the dish was extremely delicious, it surely doesn't look the part. Even the most popular stalls would have trouble selling this.

list.name: Anno dell'abbondanza sospetto
list.desc: Luxurious and exquisite raw fish. The unevenly mixed fish and condiments are as bedraggled on the plate as any dejected sailor washed ashore by roiling waves, and they do not arouse your appetites at all. Yet it would be such a further waste of these ingredients if you did not eat them — ah, what a morbid dilemma.

list.name: Spiedini ai tre sapori sospetti
list.desc: A pieced-together skewer. The burnt bamboo stick and the dull-colored ingredients give off a smell that must not be named. If you were to make this out in the wild, you might just attract some hilichurls...

list.name: Udon sospetti
list.desc: Highly springy noodles. The overly bland noodles and soup make for a boring experience. Looks like you've got to pay a bit more attention to seasoning next time.

list.name: Cinque tesori marinati sospetti
list.desc: Pickled vegetables. That's what they say, obviously, but the result should probably not have such a sour smell. The tender texture is good and all, yes, but... Yeah, this is just way too sour. Maybe a Samachurl might appreciate this?

list.name: Yakisoba sospetta
list.desc: One of Inazuma's common household dishes. Both the noodles and the side dishes show signs of having been burned black, testament to the tragedy that must have befallen earlier.

list.name: Tentazione dell'Adeptus sospetta
list.desc: A complex, famous type of Liyue cuisine. Without having mastered the art of simmering, the resulting stew-like dish has a salty, fishy taste. But, just considering the costly ingredients will be enough to keep you going until the pot's empty.

list.name: Involtini di carne alla menta sospetti
list.desc: A sour-and-spicy dish. The saltiness of the dipping sauce has completely covered the fresh flavor of the dish. If you don't wish to dilute it with water, then you'll just have to scarf it down with a big mouthful of rice.

list.name: Tonkotsu ramen sospetto
list.desc: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The noodles were all but forgotten amid the hubbub of preparing the accoutrements, leading to it almost turning into a paste and becoming one with the soup. Oh well, at least you can drink the whole lot to salvage it a bit.

list.name: Tramezzino dell'avventuriere sospetto
list.desc: A nutritious egg dish. The congealed mayonnaise is almost solid, and it is lined with tough ham and over-boiled egg. At least wolfing it down will make you full all the same.

list.name: Piatto di salumi sospetto
list.desc: A plate of cold cut meat. Seems a little too cold, probably not good for those with bad teeth or sensitive stomachs.

list.name: Insalata alla menta sospetta
list.desc: A fragrant salad dish. The Mint and Jueyun Chili have neither been matched nor incorporated well, which makes for a dish so spicy that any who eat it will be at a loss for words for a time.

list.name: Piatto di sashimi sospetto
list.desc: A seafood dish made using fresh ingredients. This has to be a practice dish. The rusty knife-work has ruined the original flavor of the ingredients, nor have the fish scales on the sashimi slices been completely cleaned off. It's... probably not too late to seek professional help...

list.name: Pollo affumicato del Nord sospetto
list.desc: Smoked fowl paired with vegetables. It's true. You really ought to try your own cooking before serving it to your guests. It's not too late to make a new one, perhaps?

list.name: Stufato di mele del Nord sospetto
list.desc: A dish with braised meat and apples. Apart from a slight sourness, it tastes just like any other down-to-earth braised meat dish, and lacks any fruity aroma. One might even wonder if the apples were put in there at all.

list.name: Zuppa di miso sospetta
list.desc: A simple and unadorned soup dish. The wilted seagrass, the crushed little bits of tofu, and the overly thick flavor are a real hazard to one's mood if consumed first thing in the morning.

list.name: Zuppa ai gigli di calla e frutti di mare sospetta
list.desc: A balanced combination of seafood. The bitterness of the calla lily, the astringency of the mint, the fishiness of the crab... Getting all the negatives together like this takes skill.

list.name: Pace universale sospetta
list.desc: Colorful staple food. Too much moisture was lost during the cooking process — at this point, it would take some imagination (and some extra water) to recoup the intended taste.

list.name: A non finire sospetto
list.desc: A snack grilled on an iron plate. It certainly looks the part, but you start getting a bad feeling about this upon first bite. Guess you can't slack off when making food after all, huh?

list.name: Carne di Tianshu sospetta
list.desc: A braised meat dish. It's been braised for too long, resulting in meat that's too soft. The fatty cuts are greasy enough to give you palpitations, and you can barely scarf them down even when wrapped in the Qingxin leaves.

list.name: Sangayaki sospetto
list.desc: A simple, humble fisherman's side dish. The overabundance of salt and rank smell of fish roll like a storm through your olfactory senses. Please keep your hands steady — please.

list.name: Tagliolini di montagna sospetti
list.desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The moisture has been sucked right out of this dish, causing the noodles to become dry. You might choke on them even if you chew slowly.

list.name: Prelibatezze del Porto di pietra sospette
list.desc: Wok-fried vegetarian food. Improper oil temperature control has caused the ingredients to reek of oil. Those who eat but a single bite will shake their heads and mourn the loss of the rare violetgrass used.

list.name: Zuppa di gnocchi di riso sospetta
list.desc: Commonly-seen city cuisine. These ingredients have cooked for so long that they have gone crisp. The only way to tell the components apart is by trawling the mix, having a small spoonful, and initiating further analysis.

list.name: Tagliolini di pesce saltati sospetti
list.desc: A main dish with an intense flavor. You can barely tell where the rice noodles end and the fish begins. The soft, floppy mouthfeel is almost unbearable — how could something that looked this simple actually require so much craft?

list.name: Ayu essiccato alla griglia sospetto
list.desc: Dried fish that has been grilled slowly over a charcoal flame. Every last droplet of moisture within the fish has been drained away, leaving behind naught but a texture that can only be compared to chewing on timber. One can barely tell the difference between fish and bones in here.

list.name: Stufato di maiale affumicato sospetto
list.desc: A dish fried over a great flame. The quality of the pork is fair enough, but it is far too salty. Have a piece of this, and you will taste nothing but brine in your mouth no matter how many Snapdragons or Matsutake mushrooms you consume.

list.name: Pancake sospetti
list.desc: A stack of round pancakes. A burnt scent masks what you can only assume should be a sweet taste. The berries are the only thing saving this dish.

list.name: Consommé ai tre sapori sospetto
list.desc: A neatly arranged dish. It certainly looks the part, but tasting it reveals the blandness of the consommé. Was it diluted too much, perhaps?

list.name: Uovo fritto di Teyvat sospetto
list.desc: An egg fried on one side. A bit hard in the middle. One can only hope it still has its nutrients.

list.name: Moranino sospetto
list.desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. The tough pastry shell almost seems to sally out against your teeth as you bite into it. If you fight through the greasiness and only chew on the minced meat, you can sort of taste its flavor.

list.name: Tofu all'orchidea sospetto
list.desc: A dish that is a test of one's knifework. The erratic knifework here has caused the ingredients to be sliced every which way. The tattered mouthfeel is enough to make one despair. Only the rank taste of beans stands as proof that the main ingredient of this dish was tofu in the first place.

list.name: Taiyaki sospetto
list.desc: A snack shaped like a snapper. The filling is way too sweet, with a single small bite leaving you in dire need of some water to wash it all down. Even the sweetest of teeth will find stomaching this a rather tall order.

list.name: Uova di luna piena sospette
list.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The warped dough wraps the meat stiffly, and the dry mouthfeel leads to the illusion that one is chewing on a giant chunk of gnocchi.

list.name: Tortino lunare sospetto
list.desc: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. The burnt-yellow meringue looks barely passable. Don't let any Mondstadt locals see you dead with this thing, or they might just take it upon themselves to ensure that you never fail again.

list.name: Tofu di mandorle sospetto
list.desc: A dessert made from ground almonds. The almond milk is chilled without being properly ground and strained. You can only lie to yourself that its rough texture is what makes it special.

list.name: Vieni a prenderlo! sospetto
list.desc: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients... dumped into scalding-hot water and boiled beyond recognition. As if the taste of everything and nothing at the same time isn't bad enough, you'll want to watch out for the sand, too...

list.name: Involtini di carne ai matsutake sospetti
list.desc: A pan-fried meat dish. Though the dry and tough texture is miles away from what it could be, the Matsutake is too nutritious to let it go to waste.

list.name: Pesce scoiattolo sospetto
list.desc: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. Sure, you can make out the shape of the fish, but you can't see how it's related to any squirrel. It just proves that the more complicated the dish is to prepare, the harder it is to prepare it well.

list.name: Mizu manju alle bacche sospetto
list.desc: A crystal-clear snack. It certainly looks like "mizu," or water — but unfortunately, it tastes like it too. Where did you go wrong?

list.name: Gamberetti cristallini sospetti
list.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The dull outer skin has a rather sticky mouthfeel which, when combined with the dry stuffing within, makes this dish a torment best ended sooner.

list.name: Stufato di persico a dorso scuro sospetto
list.desc: A poached fish dish. It has essentially lost all the taste of the fish itself to the spicy taste of the chili peppers. Only a selected few enjoy such a sensory overload on their tongues.

list.name: Piatto micioso rinvigorente sospetto
list.desc: This main dish looks rather cute. However, its appearance betrays a lack of experience in the making, with the final product being every bit the hastily thrown together slapdash job. Who knows if the provisional head priestess Neko will accept this...

list.name: Gamberetti saltati sospetti
list.desc: A mild and luscious dish. In an overzealous attempt to prevent the food from sticking to the bottom of the pot, too much oil was added. Despite having been subjected to this rather heavy-duty frying process, the shrimp still have a surprisingly pleasant texture — but mind you don't eat too many, or you'll get a sore throat.

list.name: Toast del pescatore sospetto
list.desc: Onion-covered toast. Not quite cooked right. You'll notice its imperfection, even if you eat it while fishing.

list.name: pollame alla straniera sospetto
list.desc: A meat dish drizzled with sauce. Nothing seems wrong here at first, but in time, you will know the tragic extent of your failings. Poultry made without trimming off some fat and oil is far too greasy to swallow, and even its combination with vegetables cannot save this dish.

list.name: Insalata nutriente sospetta
list.desc: A vegetable salad. Regrettably, it seems the best time to plate the potatoes and boiled eggs was missed.

list.name: Spaghetti al ragù fiammante sospetti
list.desc: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. A bit chewy and annoyingly sticks to your teeth.

list.name: Tramezzino al tonkatsu sospetto
list.desc: A nutritionally-balanced meal. Well, you say that, but vegetables are withered, the meat is dry and wooden, and the bread slices are way too firm... You know what? It doesn't matter. A person needs to fill their stomach and all...

list.name: Polpette di ravanello fritte sospette
list.desc: Fried Radish Balls. Way too oily, and leaves you looking for something to drink to cut through the grease.

list.name: Pesce corno alla griglia sospetto
list.desc: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. You can barely see that this charred lump is indeed grilled fish, and upon further investigation, the fish scales mixed in confirm that this is indeed the case.

list.name: Bistecca sospetta
list.desc: A grilled steak. Its color is a little bleak, almost as if it feels sorry for itself for being a sorry excuse for a steak.

list.name: Pizza ai funghi sospetta
list.desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. If you can bite through the brick-like texture... At least it can ease your hunger.

list.name: Filetto saltato sospetto
list.desc: Slices of meat stir-fried on high heat — but for so long that they are now indistinguishable from the accompanying Jueyun Chili. Best served with rice, if served at all.

list.name: Zuppa di gemme sospetta
list.desc: A simple vegetable soup. The bland soup and dull vegetables remind you of the dying vegetables on abandoned and barren farmlands.

list.name: Pollo ai Fiordolci sospetto
list.desc: Honey-roasted fowl. The sweet flowers have been burnt off, revealing the bitter taste of the overcooked fowl.

list.name: Sushi di gamberetti sospetto
list.desc: A fresh and sweet traditional dish. The shrimp look a little shriveled, and a single bite leaves grains of rice stuck to your teeth. Note to self: best not to leave it out for so long next time...

list.name: Stufato di carne e verdure sospetto
list.desc: A meat and vegetable stew. Surprisingly dry for something that's meant to have liquid.

list.name: Gulasch sospetto
list.desc: A steaming-hot stew. There was some flaw in the flame control during the stewing process, leading to a product with a very stiff mouthfeel. You can ignore those flaws if you scarf it all down — it'll keep the cold away regardless.

list.name: Panini di riso sospetti
list.desc: Soft and fluffy buns. The dough has not been proofed properly, meaning the buns did not puff up evenly during the steaming process. The resulting coarse, hard texture leaves much to be desired.

list.name: Budino di riso sospetto
list.desc: A dessert made from rice. There must have been some miscalculation in the amount of ingredients to use, as this just tastes like a bowl of overly sweet rice. Well, time to grab some plain drink and scarf it down...

list.name: Abalone vegetariano sospetto
list.desc: A vegetarian dish with a rich flavor. The overly thick sauce has totally covered the freshness that the ingredients should have had, and the condiment leaves your mouth dry no matter how much you wash it down with water.

list.name: Asteria arcobaleno sospetta
list.desc: Una bibita senz'altro unica. Ha un bell'aspetto e il gusto è accettabile, se non si conta l'astringenza causata dalla preparazione impropria del Melonlavanda...

list.name: Carne stufata sospetta
list.desc: A stewed dish. The stewing process seems to have been bungled, with the ingredients just have been bundled into the pot to cook together, resulting in wilted vegetables that have all but dissolved into the soup, leaving nothing to this pot but the greasy taste of meat...

list.name: Stufato di Konda sospetto
list.desc: Slowly stewed local cuisine. If the fowl that had not been fried beforehand could still barely be tolerated, the un-boiled lavender melon truly makes this a culinary disaster. Not only is the taste astringent, but the mix even stains your tongue to the point where someone else might think that you were being poisoned.

list.name: Guoba di Jueyun sospetto
list.desc: One of Liyue's specialty snacks. The browned Jueyun Chilis and ham stick together on top of a crust that has barely retained its flavor, and you can only tell them apart by the mouthfeel.

list.name: Tempura ai fiori di sakura sospetta
list.desc: A dish deep-fried in oil. Perhaps it is an inexperience in controlling oil temperatures showing, but the ingredients began giving off a pungent smoke the instant they were dipped into the wok. The batter is now all mottled and browned. Shame about the waste... but best not to eat it, perhaps.

list.name: Cracker di gamberetti ai fiori di sakura sospetti
list.desc: Crispy, crunchy crackers. The result looks a little dull, though the round shape does indicate that these are indeed "senbei" crackers... albeit ones that taste more like rank "Shrimp" than anything else.

list.name: Mochi ai fiori di sakura sospetti
list.desc: A delicate and elegant snack. Its exterior looks fair enough, but its sickening sweetness almost causes it to get stuck in your throat, leaving you with no appetite for another.

list.name: Ravioli di giada sospetti
list.desc: An exquisite-looking dish. Food ingredients of different degrees of doneness are wrapped in shriveled vegetables. It looks depressing to say the least.

list.name: Zuppa di germogli di bambù sospetta
list.desc: A soup dish that's been stewed for a good long while. The inexpert heat control has caused the fresh meat to be a bit tough, and the salty ham has covered the expected taste. The bamboo shoots, which have absorbed the flavors of both meats, are probably the only acceptable part of this dish.

list.name: Wakatakeni sospetto
list.desc: A light-colored vegetarian dish. The seaweed takes forever to swallow and the overly-hard bamboo shoots look like they might wear out the teeth. Probably best left looked at but not eaten.

list.name: Soba sospetta
list.desc: A plain and simple noodle dish. The rough texture drags itself across your tongue and leaves a bitter aftertaste after you forcibly swallow. Can this... stuff still be considered noodles?

list.name: Zuppa di semi di loto e uova d'uccello sospetta
list.desc: Una zuppa con uova cotte al vapore. La lunga cottura al vapore ha fatto comparire una forma simile a un alveare sulla superficie della crema all'uovo. Va da sé che il loto non ha conservato nemmeno un accenno della sua amarezza.

list.name: Frittelle di loto sospette
list.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The lotus petals have lost their original color, turning brown and wilted under the merciless heat of hot oil.

list.name: Zuppa vegetariana di ravanelli sospetta
list.desc: Radish-based vegetable soup. The vegetables within appear to have been victims of a frost.

list.name: Frittelle di patate di Mondstadt sospette
list.desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. It's said that a hash brown without jam is not worthy of the Mondstadt name... But is this even a hash brown?

list.name: Pesce alla griglia di Mondstadt sospetto
list.desc: Fish grilled thoroughly with moderate fire. Sadly, it's a bit too well done. The charred smell and the dry texture are not too impressive.

list.name: Filetti di unagi alla griglia sospetti
list.desc: A grilled dish. Even at first glance, this is a complete failure — the color of the eel meat looks exactly the same as the charcoal used to make it. Even when flipped over to eat, the intense stench of charred meat would make one hesitate.

list.name: Gelatina alla menta sospetta
list.desc: A refreshing dessert. Some little accidents occurred during the making of this dish, causing the jelly to emerge unevenly frozen. Well, it could still serve should you want to drink some mint cordial...

list.name: Omelette di riso sospetta
list.desc: A main dish wrapped up in an egg skin. The egg skin just about barely covers the rice, and it has been fried for so long that it has lost all fluidity. Might as well call it "fried egg on rice."

list.name: Arrosto al miele sospetto
list.desc: A meat dish in a sweet honey sauce. The sauce has stuck like glue to the meat, forming a homogeneous mass that tastes neither of honey nor meat.

list.name: Kourayaki di uova di granchio sospetto
list.desc: A crab meat dish that has been cooked directly over the flames. The crushed shell-fragments and the crab roe have been slurried together. Butting your teeth up against those hard bits is one thing, but irrecoverable is any desire you may have had to enjoy the food.

list.name: Tortino di granchio, prosciutto e verdure al forno sospetto
list.desc: A somewhat luxurious bake. By looking at it, no one can tell what it is made of... or what it lacks.

list.name: Tofu con uova di granchio sospetto
list.desc: A dish with a tender mouthfeel. Even the freshest crab roe cannot mask the taste of over-aged tofu. Crushing it up with your chopsticks and mixing it into white rice is all you can do to force it down your gullet.

list.name: Soffritto alla Qingce sospetto
list.desc: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. This one was a failed test run, being unpleasantly bitter and uncomfortably spicy. You could try mixing it with rice — or you could simply discard it and eat the rice instead.

list.name: Wotou di carne al peperoncino sospetti
list.desc: A traditional snack from Liyue. A large bundle of fried-up Jueyun Chili has been piled up in the middle, and their heat is all but unbearable. Just one small bite feels like someone's trying to burn your throat. A few more bites, and who knows, you might actually end up breathing fire like Guoba!

list.name: Spiedino di pollo e funghi sospetto
list.desc: A skewer of mushrooms and poultry. At first glance it's hard to tell which is which.

list.name: Polpette di gamberetti dorate sospette
list.desc: A deep-fried shrimp dish. Hastily cast into hot oil and promptly forgotten about, the result is a disastrous combination of raw shrimp and burnt potato strips.

list.name: Sushi di tonno sospetto
list.desc: A traditional dish made with one's bare hands. The color of the fish slices looks a little weird, and it's hard to tell if the problem here is the sour rice or the rank fish.

list.name: Ratatouille di Barbatos sospetta
list.desc: A simple chowder with a long history. Thought the Anemo Archon is said to symbolize freedom, perhaps this dish has been a bit too liberal in the making. Perhaps the name Stormy Stew might be more fitting here.

list.name: Onigiri sospetti
list.desc: A portable dish made with rice. It just about has a triangular shape, but is so loose that it threatens to disintegrate should you pick it up. Yes, disintegrate — like the expectations of your prospective guests.

list.name: Pollo al peperoncino di Jueyun sospetto
list.desc: Chicken in a dressing, served cold. The chicken probably isn't properly marinated, so it's only salty on the outside but bland on the inside. The taste reminds you of water-poached chicken breasts.

list.name: Cocktail di patate fritte con gamberetti sospetto
list.desc: An attractive-looking pre-meal snack. Too much time was unknowingly spent being preoccupied with the details of this dish's form. The potato slices that were meant to form the base have already turned soft, detracting greatly from the mouthfeel.

list.name: Zuppa di pesce e ravanello sospetta
list.desc: A meat and vegetable dish. It certainly looks like the complete package, but careful tasting will reveal that there is no flavor of fresh fish in the radishes at all... Wait a minute, what are these fishbones doing in there instead?

list.name: Chazuke di unagi sospetto
list.desc: A light and tasty main dish. The overly bland tea soup has been all but overpowered by the taste of the unagi, but you can probably still eat this if you slurried it into some sort of porridge.

list.name: Sushi di uova d'uccello sospetto
list.desc: An everyday Inazuman dish. The egg roll was not beaten evenly and the vinegared rice was also over-seasoned... Even simple dishes leave no room for carelessness.

list.name: Involtini di frittata sospetti
list.desc: A fried egg dish. It looks way too soft... and what do you know, it comes apart the instant it so much as touches chopsticks. Might as well use a spoon at this point.

list.name: Pollo al tofu sospetto
list.desc: A dish that requires great precision to make. The soup base is far too salty and the texture of the chicken tofu pudding is not delicate enough. Lack of technical proficiency has led to a dish that looks the part, but has no soul.

list.name: Matsutake saltati sospetti
list.desc: Sautéed slices of Matsutake. A shame that control of the fire was lost. Best you can do now is try to trick people who didn't see you cooking it into thinking they are just potato chips.

list.name: Spratto al burro saltato sospetto
list.desc: Un piatto di pesce rosolato in padella. Il pesce è stato cotto troppo a lungo, e ciò lo ha privato della sua freschezza e morbidezza. Se provi a toccarlo con le posate, rischi che si rompa in piccoli pezzi.

list.name: Granchio al burro sospetto
list.desc: A grilled crab dish. The crab legs are still cold, and have a raw, salty flavor to them, almost as if one were being force-fed some seawater.

list.name: Granchio dorato sospetto
list.desc: A crab dish cooked in the ancient ways. The flour granules within have congealed like gravel, and have some crab shell mixed in. But compared to the blandness of the crab meat, the taste of crab shell is at least worth having a go at.

list.name: Tagliolini barba di drago sospetti
list.desc: Noodles that are as slender as the hairs on a dragon's beard. The all-consuming attempt to make the noodles as thin as possible caused the pieces to break up during the cooking process. This is harder than it looks — and you're in need of more practice for sure.

list.name: Fotokamera kuriosa
list.desc:
Use this during the "Five Flushes of Fortune" event to store images of objects with a specific color.
Ji Tong imported this new-fangled Kamera model from Fontaine, but it doesn't seem to work quite as he'd hoped...

list.name: Piuma peculiare
list.desc:
A strange feather.
It may be able to trigger some wondrous effects if used on Tsurumi Island.
Take this feather with you into the world.

You did promise him that you would, after all.

list.name: Panna
list.desc: A dairy product made from milk. An essential ingredient in making pastries.

list.name: Formaggio
list.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

list.name: Endora curiosa
list.desc:
Una strana larva di Lochfolk, curiosa di conoscere il mondo.

I Lochfolk sono specializzati nel tramutarsi in acqua e possono fondersi con altri corpi idrici per sincronizzare emozioni e conoscenze. Endora è ancora giovane ed è molto curiosa. Riesce a sputare delle bolle per mescolarsi ad altri esseri d'acqua, attraverso i quali imparerà ogni cosa.

list.name: Endora
list.desc: È solo una Lochfolk molto curiosa che desidera vedere il mondo. Potrebbe andare davvero molto d'accordo con Mini Seelie - Fiore del mattino, ma cerca di non farli unire, grazie.

list.name: Polvere di Azoth
list.desc:
A device that can transmute elemental Ascension Materials and change their Elemental Type.
Its practical uses notwithstanding, alchemy is the study of the nature of matter and the rules that underpin its transformations, and ultimately it seeks to comprehend the working principles of the world and the flow of the ley lines.
It is not known who would share alchemical achievements of this magnitude with the civilizations of the world and why. But although the power to fundamentally transmute elemental energy in its crystallized and inert form is a highly useful one, this device also conceals the grave danger of disrupting the elemental balance...

list.name: Legno d'aralia
list.desc:
Wood from the Inazuman Cedar. It is soft, has straight veins, and gives off a light fragrance.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Versi hilichurliani ambigui
list.desc: A list of lines from Ella Musk. On the front are many terms in Hilichurlian, and the back has some simple footnotes regarding the content...

list.name: Polvere di ciste cristallina
list.desc: Un grosso grumo di polvere di spore ottenuta da una ciste di spore strutturalmente completa. Inserita in un ambiente adatto, potrebbe colonizzare la zona di floride aggregazioni di Miconoidi fluttuanti...

list.name: Sabbie brillanti di Guyun
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione delle armi.
I pilastri di pietra che si ergono nel mezzo della Foresta di pietra di Guyun furono un tempo le lance di pietra usate da Morax per sconfiggere i suoi nemici. Col tempo, l'essenza degli dèi che i pilastri tengono fermi si è infiltrata nella pietra stessa, conferendole un potere divino. A volte i pilastri perdono dei frammenti carichi d'odio e di maledizioni.

list.name: Reliquia di Guyun
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The stone spear has a glimmering core formed by the power of the defeated gods. Their hatred is not directed at Morax, however, for they have lost themselves a long time ago and are incapable of holding personal grudges.

list.name: Corpo divino di Guyun
list.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
That which lurks within and animates this relic are the divine remains of lamenting gods. They are unrealized ideals, designs for a prosperous humanity that could never be. They may now lie deep within stone and sea, but they will not go quietly into the night.

list.name: Pietra lucente di Guyun
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione delle armi.
I dotti sanno che la Foresta di pietra di Guyun è molto più di uno spettacolo miracoloso che affiora dal mare: è il cimitero degli dèi passati di Liyue. Odio e sudiciume si sono periodicamente sollevati in quel luogo, ma sono sempre stati contenuti da un giovane in grado di sottomettere i demoni.

list.name: Manichino d'addestramento intatto
list.desc: An intact training dummy. Very sturdy, perfect for training.

list.name: Corridoio della residenza ufficiale Portata della potenza
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Official Residence: Power's Reach.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Pozione sperimentale
list.desc: A potion that Albedo made using alchemy. Despite its unusual color, Albedo insists that the potion will work just as expected. Drinking it should not cause any adverse side effects.

list.name: Cena del giudizio
list.desc: Rosaria's specialty. The seemingly dark thorns make it hard to know how to begin tucking in. After some effort, you manage to clear the ornamentation away... and to your surprise, the first taste of the tender chicken unveils a shockingly lovely taste. As Rosaria studies your reaction, she seems pleased.

list.name: Emblema del Cacciatore di tesori
list.desc: Un emblema che rappresenta con orgoglio la posizione del proprietario come membro dei Cacciatori di tesori. La ricerca del tesoro non conosce limiti. Detto ciò... essere un ladro è qualcosa di cui essere orgogliosi?

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Pergamena divinatoria
list.desc: Una pergamena che probabilmente si riferisce a un qualche tipo di magia. Emette un calore inspiegabile ma minaccioso.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Pergamena sigillata
list.desc: Una vecchia pergamena priva di dettagli e poco chiara. Seguendo le immagini su di essa, alcune creature magiche possono riprodurre parte della sua magia.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Emblema del tenente
list.desc: Un emblema per identificare gli ufficiali. I Fatui hanno un esercito di dimensioni colossali, quindi chi ha raggiunto questo grado all'interno del gruppo dev'essere qualcuno di veramente speciale.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Lampadulina
list.desc: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

list.name: Conversazione tra il Piccolo Meng, il Piccolo Fei e la Piccola Lulu
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/A Record of Little Meng, Little Fei, and Little Lulu's Conversation_icon.png
list.desc: A record of Little Meng, Little Fei and Little Lulu's conversation. It appears to only be the straightforward conversation of children. But one can dimly sense some unnameable emotion sprouting in the hearts of the children. Perhaps this sprout will continue to gradually grow until its branches stretch out across the skies, no longer able to be ignored by anyone...

list.name: Frumento
list.desc: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

list.name: Malinconia di Vera (I)
list.desc:
I don't ever think the world is monotonous. It's just that interesting things happen in far away galaxies.
The great adventure of Vera, an ordinary girl always fascinated by distant lands, secretly begins.

list.name: Malinconia di Vera (VII)
list.desc:
In the star clusters at the outer reaches of the universe, habitable planets are few and far between. For this reason, the region is the playground of space captains and pirates alone.
With this being the universe, though, there is no port and starboard in the traditional sense — out here, "starboard" means whichever side of your spacecraft is oriented towards the star you are using for navigation...
Lose yourself, and especially your sense of direction, in this next chapter of Vera's starbound voyage!

list.name: Malinconia di Vera (III)
list.desc:
The Andromeda Empire stretches across half the galaxy group. Every planet within the Empire has its own demons and deities, dragons and monsters.
"I've come up with a story for every star from your home." "That's not possible. Looking from here, the Andromeda Galaxy is only one fifth the size of your moon."
So continues Vera's adventure.

list.name: Malinconia di Vera (IX)
list.desc:
"Vera's so beautiful, like a shining star in the universe, but I..." "Boys at this age are always more petite than girls of a similar age."
Childhood must be let go of to welcome the coming of the adolescent years. It's not too late to think about it now... Real melancholy finally hits Vera.

list.name: Malinconia di Vera (II)
list.desc:
Everything's just boring. Everything, all the time. It's not depression. It's just reaching the age of 14.
So begins Vera's adventure.

list.name: Malinconia di Vera (V)
list.desc:
You can't have picnics on the sides of a galactic highway! Even the deities will be held fully responsible for road accidents that might occur!
The doorway to a study in a simple village connects to anywhere in space and time! Having tea with the deities, playing hide-and-seek across time... Vera's great adventure continues!

list.name: Malinconia di Vera (VIII)
list.desc:
Of course boys aren't invited to the girl's slumber party! Girls are sacrosanct, like the gods of the golden age.
Vera, the Princess, Saint King Lebannin, and Ur, alpha female of the Galactic Swarm, shall talk deep into the night!

list.name: Malinconia di Vera (VI)
list.desc:
There was once a great scholar who wished to write a book about all the festive days of the empire.
After looking into it more closely, he discovered that every single day had some sort of a festival associated with it... He persevered with this monumental writing task for six months before giving up on it.
But don't worry — as far as this book is concerned, I am the author, and I won't let my readers down!

list.name: Malinconia di Vera (X)
list.desc:
"It's enough. Let's go home... The furthest place I've dreamt of, is the Delphi where you are."
Though the explanation is delayed, you should know that Delphi is the center of Greek mythology. Vera's Melancholy - the perfect ending... or is it?

list.name: Malinconia di Vera (IV)
list.desc:
There is a saying that goes as follows: Not all that glitters is gold, sometimes it is the outpouring of a broken heart.
Either way, the stars in the sky certainly aren't made of gold, and most people's hearts aren't made of glass.
In any case — here is the next chapter of Vera's adventure!

list.name: Serenteiera
list.desc: A teapot obtained from Madame Ping. There seems to be a whole new realm within it...

list.name: Lettera di Nikolay
list.desc: A letter you found off one of the Black Serpent Knights. The name of the letter's recipient is neatly written: "Katarina Snezhevna, My Dear Elder Sister," while the sender's name is written somewhat haphazardly, though you can make out the words "Your Brother, Nikolay Snezhevich."

list.name: Sangayaki
list.desc: A simple, humble fisherman's side dish. Freshly caught fish is de-skinned and sliced, minced together with Snapdragon, mixed with miso and salt to form a batter, and then finally grilled. The lovely scent enters your nose long before the food enters your mouth. Three servings later, and you're still raring to go for more.

list.name: Tagliolini di montagna freddi
list.desc: La specialità di Chongyun. Sebbene questi tagliolini siano un piatto irresistibile durante l'estate soffocante, Chongyun insiste nel mangiarli anche durante i periodi più freddi dell'inverno. Che tipo.

list.name: Tagliolini di montagna
list.desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.

list.name: Miscellanea sulle montagne
list.desc: This text contains all manner of strange legends about Mt. Tianheng's stones, including tales about many rare ores. It is said that if you stand in the middle of the lake south of Mt. Tianheng at dusk, you will find the legendary Subrosium.

list.name: Meridiana delle ere
list.desc:
One of the six lost offerings scattered throughout The Chasm. It seems quite old now, but the etchings are still very clear, and so it can still be used.
The sun is a rare sight down in The Chasm, and it is easy to lose track of time. But someday, this sundial will once again track the passage of years.

list.name: Sigillo di Geo
list.desc:
Un emblema che esprime la riconoscenza dei promontori di Liyue.

Puoi scambiarlo per degli oggetti speciali a Liyue.

list.name: Bussola di Geo
list.desc:
A compass that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby chests.
The land of Geo is rich with valuable resources, with treasures hidden throughout the mountains and wilderness just waiting to be found.

list.name: Prelibatezze del Porto di pietra
list.desc: Wok-fried vegetarian food. A stir-fried selection of three ingredients hailing from Liyue. Though the methodology is simple, it brings out the intense, innate flavors of the ingredients, and does not fade in brilliance when compared to some high-class delicacy.

list.name: Leggenda dell'Archon di Geo: Dio della storia
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Legend of the Geo Archon: God of History_icon.png
list.desc: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as the God of History.

list.name: Leggenda dell'Archon di Geo: Dio dei pionieri
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Legend of the Geo Archon: The Groundbreaker_icon.png
list.desc: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as The Groundbreaker.

list.name: Leggenda dell'Archon di Geo: Dio dei fornelli
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Legend of the Geo Archon: God of the Stove_icon.png
list.desc: Stories about the Geo Archon as the God of the Stove.

list.name: Leggenda dell'Archon di Geo: Dio della ricchezza
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Legend of the Geo Archon: God of Wealth_icon.png
list.desc: Stories about the Geo Archon and his divine duties as the God of Wealth.

list.name: Pietra di risonanza per Geoculi
list.desc:
A stone that can be used in Liyue to search for nearby Geoculi.
This exquisite stone plate imitates a certain mysterious quality of the Geo Statues of The Seven, causing it to lead people to the location of Geoculi.
Elemental Oculi represent the lost power of the Statues of The Seven — perhaps offering this power back to the statues also has significance for the lands that the gods watch over.

list.name: Area di lavoro temporanea
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making Temporary Work Quarters.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Vita della sacerdotessa Mouun
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/The Life of Mouun the Shrine Maiden_icon.png
list.desc: For the people of Watatsumi, the legends of the Archon War are always filled with bitterness. Many of these millennia-old folksongs tell of a shrine maiden by the name of Mouun, who once rode upon the back of a sea monster, following the Great Serpent unto a tragic, moving end.

list.name: Zuppa di gnocchi di riso
list.desc: Commonly-seen city cuisine. The ingredients have gorged themselves on the soup, making them most enticing indeed. They say that in the first, this dish only had a scant few ingredients, but more were added as time passed, resulting in its present form.

list.name: Stoffa
list.desc: Some fabric of fine make. It will surely be of use in making furnishings.

list.name: Rex Incognito (I)
list.desc: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Set in an age when the treasures of the world flocked forth, fact merges with fiction and both blend with old dreams in this charming tale set in the commercial port of Liyue.

list.name: Rex Incognito (III)
list.desc: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Iron-clad concepts of rules or equity fade into nothingness in this fantastical tale.

list.name: Rex Incognito (II)
list.desc: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. Between lofty mountain peaks where bounteous jade lies beneath, substantial ideas and empty lies are suddenly shown up side by side.

list.name: Rex Incognito (IV)
list.desc: A Liyue fantasy novel that tells the tales of Rex Lapis' incognito excursions in the mortal realm. In an age when scrutiny was laid upon the treasures of the world, one humble witticism was all it took to expose all lies.

list.name: Leguminosa di Tokoyo
list.desc: A special plant that was produced via the Watatsumi Goryou Matsuri. With the awakening of the Sangacorexes, the elemental energies within Enkanomiya have been pacified. This is a naturally-growing fertilizing crop that will turn into loam within the soil once it decays.

list.name: Il serpente e i draghi di Tokoyokoku
list.desc: Un romanzo basato sui racconti popolari dell'Isola di Watatsumi. L'edizione originale del testo venne composta sull'Isola di Watatsumi e poi riportata sull'Isola di Narukami da un mercante, al tempo in cui viveva ancora il Dio serpente. Nessuno al giorno d'oggi legge più questo libro antico, visto che è stato soppiantato da tutte le light novel presenti sul mercato. Questo volume descrive la singolare prospettiva cosmologica della gente di Watatsumi prima che iniziasse ad adottare gli aspetti della cultura Narukami. Alcuni temi ripresi recentemente dall'editoria tradizionale hanno permesso a questo libro di vedere nuovamente la luce.

list.name: Seme del fuoco eterno
list.desc:
Un seme che alimenta le fiamme eterne del Regisreptus di Pyro. Emette energia di Pyro come se dovesse bruciare tutto ciò che è mai germogliato dal terreno.

Un'infinità di desideri scorre tra l'energia turbolenta nelle profondità della terra. Quale desiderio riuscirebbe a trattenere stabilmente un tale fuoco sulle piante e a desiderare così ardentemente di inondare tutto con delle fiamme inestinguibili?

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Leggenda trionfante
list.desc: Gorou's specialty. The side dishes have been piled high to form a sight as moving as Gorou's own motivations. As you finish the noodles and soup all in one go and pat your stomach in satisfaction, you look up and see Gorou... smiling radiantly as his tail wags from side to side (the latter probably unbeknownst to him!)

list.name: Seme avvizzito
list.desc:
A seemingly withered object that seems to, by normal judgment, be a seed. However, it still has a surprising amount of life in it yet.
Best not to eat it for now...

list.name: Tagliolini di pesce saltati
list.desc: A main dish with an intense flavor. Created by stir-frying rice noodles, par-cooked fish, and various side dishes in a wok on high flame. The noodles, having absorbed the flavors of the various ingredients, are springy and smooth to the taste, making this dish a big hit with diners.

list.name: Ayu essiccato alla griglia
list.desc: Dried fish that has been grilled slowly over a charcoal flame. Fish air-dried overnight have a tinge of the salty sea wind and give off a tantalizing flavor when grilled. Many Inazumans who dwell near the sea know this taste well indeed.

list.name: Stufato di maiale affumicato
list.desc: A dish fried over a great flame. Matsutake and Ham have been sliced up, stir-fried, and garnished with some spicy condiments. The flavor of the Ham is a match for the Matsutake's crispness, and the combination grows ever lovelier and more addictive as you chew. The heat-conducting wok also serves to keep it piping hot for long periods.

list.name: Marcia degli spiriti
list.desc: La specialità di Hu Tao. Le facce tondeggianti dei demoni schiacciate l'una contro l'altra sono piuttosto carine. Ma se per qualsivoglia motivo si decidesse di assaggiarne una, lo si rimpiagerebbe per molto tempo... Dopotutto, questo piatto è così pieno di ingredienti d'alta qualità dal sapore unico... Aspetta, che diamine è questa roba?

list.name: Fungo fluorescente
list.desc: Un fungo che splende come una luce notturna. Custodisce un potere misterioso.

list.name: Statuetta malefica
list.desc:
Una scultura con un occhio solo che emana un'energia minacciosa, che non lascia intendere di cosa sia fatta.

Quando guardi la statuetta, puoi quasi sentire uno strano bisbiglio confortante...

"Vedi, figlio mio. Tutto ciò che giace al di sotto del trono del cielo sarà distrutto dal cambiamento. La pace eterna del buio vuoto cingerà noi tutti nel suo abbraccio."

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Pancake
list.desc: A stack of round pancakes. A staple originating from afternoon tea in manors. Only the best berries should be picked for this dish.

list.name: Elmo protettivo
list.desc:
One of the six lost offerings scattered throughout The Chasm. It was found hidden in the living quarters of the miners. A slightly less discerning eye might have mistaken it for a miner's hat.
It is heavily scarred and pitted, making one wonder how many miners' lives it must have saved.

list.name: Offerte del Tempio
list.desc: Offerings from the Evernight Temple that contain a fraction of Aberaku's remnant thoughts.

list.name: Frammento di Redini della rinascita (Tempio)
list.desc: A fragment of the Reins of Revival. It has some special power.

list.name: Lettera aperta
list.desc: A letter that seems brand new but that has already been opened. It gives off a light sakura scent.

list.name: Solvente dei sogni
list.desc:
Un oggetto in grado di cambiare in qualsiasi forma necessaria i materiali per l'aumento di livello dei personaggi ottenuti dai ricordi e dalle prove.

La gente un tempo credeva che gli spiriti e i ricordi avessero una forma materiale. Se qualcuno sognava il paradiso per poi svegliarsi stringendo un fiore, allora quel fiore doveva essere stato creato da tale fantasia. Il solvente dei sogni dissolve ciò che si ottiene dal ricordo e lo trasforma in qualche altro sogno. In effetti, i colpi scambiati con i forti sono passi lungo la strada per diventare più forte a tua volta.

list.name: Via della forza
list.desc: Arataki Itto's specialty. He insists that this is a "heretofore unmatched dish" hand-made by "Arataki 'Number One Gourmet' Itto." Whether standing, sitting, or lying down, this'll fill your tummy in one shot and send you well on your way to becoming the second-mightiest being in the world. What a swell guy.

list.name: Bozza a colori
list.desc: An unfinished painting by Vermeer the artist. He says that his lost paints and brushes are at the viewing spot where he painted this work.

list.name: Paramano kageuchi
list.desc:
Un'elsa che faceva un tempo parte di una spada di una certa importanza.
Inazuma ha una lunga tradizione nella produzione delle spade. Mentre le realizzano, i fabbri spesso forgiano varie armi insieme, prima di scegliere la "shinuchi", ovvero l'arma migliore, mentre le altre sono conosciute come "kageuchi".

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Legno Otogi
list.desc:
Wood from the Otogi Tree. It has just the right amount of moisture and oil, and as such has a great many uses.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Barile Tanin in legno Otogi
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Otogi "Tanin" Wood Barrel.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Barile Rikuyou in legno Otogi
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Otogi "Rikuyou" Wooden Barrel.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Recinto Kintake in legno Otogi
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Otogi "Kintake" Fence.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Cancello del cortile Kintake in legno Otogi
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Otogi "Kintake" Courtyard Gate.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Bottega in legno Otogi semplice
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Simple Otogi Workshop.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Statua di Sua Eccellenza, la potente Narukami Ogosho, Dea del tuono
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Statue of Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, God of Thunder_icon.png
list.desc: The Statue of Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, God of Thunder that Sara has been hankering after. Go on, go give it to her.

list.name: Perla spirituale
list.desc: An ancient, vibrant pearl, within which lies the secret of the ocean depths.

list.name: Chiosco degli omikuji Veggenza
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Fortune Slip Stand: Omen-Reader.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Briglia dorata
list.desc: The hereditary national treasure of Byakuyakoku. It represents the highest authority in the land and confers the power to control Evernight and Whitenight upon its wielder.

list.name: Nettare brillante
list.desc:
Del nettare colmo di pura energia elementale.

Gli studiosi generalmente concordano sul fatto che i Malefiori sono forme di vita avanzata tra le piante elementali, ma non c'è ancora una spiegazione soddisfacente riguardo alle loro abitudini predatorie.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Lista della spesa di Kokomi
list.desc: A shopping list of books compiled by Kokomi. All the genres, unit prices, and amounts of the books she desires have been written down here in her elegant script.

list.name: Memorie dell'Albero del Geleterno
list.desc: Through this memory, you can master the method to make a Frostbearer (Catalyst).

list.name: Cuore perpetuo
list.desc:
Il nucleo che alimenta i movimenti autonomi del Macchinario perpetuo.

Alcuni teorizzano che i simboli su questi nuclei siano ricoperti di trascrizioni sulla conoscenza e sulla logica in un linguaggio che l'occhio non riesce a percepire. Qualcuno si spinge anche oltre, ritenendo che queste singolari Macchine delle rovine decidano autonomamente di rinunciare a una forma biomimetica per seguire la forza della funzione per via dei loro nuclei particolarmente grandi e delle iscrizioni complesse.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Olio essenziale folgorante
list.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Electro, boosting Electro DMG.
It induces a tingling sensation on the skin and renders the user better able to better channel Electro energy — but comes with a risk of causing an electrical fire that would definitely ruin your perfect hair.

list.name: Compidesideri
list.desc:
If you can stay within the Ideal Tension Zone while fishing, this rod will shorten the time in which fish will struggle by a stable amount and increase your chances of success. This effect only works in Liyue.

A long rod that stands like elegant bamboo. It is said to have been constructed and kept by a skilled hermit from Liyue, and it was first discovered on a stone tablet with the following words carved upon it: "O you who aspire, take up this rod," like a legendary sword waiting for a hero to pull it out. Of course, you only ever hear this glorious origin story from the mouths of merchants, so it may just be some rhetoric used to increase the item's value... But those who know this and still use this rod can only be those who are ready and willing to accept this pact.

list.name: Fungo anemofilo
list.desc: Un fungo che cresce accarezzato dal vento, e parimenti eterno come fonte di nutrimento.

list.name: Fascio di legna
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Wood Bundle.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Maschera funeraria
list.desc:
A trophy obtained from defeating Signora, Eighth of the Fatui Harbingers.
The Fatui often face the world from behind their masks, and it is said that this is because all they once were mean nothing once they become Fatui, and thus must they forsake their true names and faces alike.

—Yet the act of giving up all that makes up an "I" — one's past and the bonds that come with it — is no mean feat.
Perhaps it is fair to say that only those who possess an obsession close to or even exceeding the level of delusion might be willing to join this group that so rebels against the Heavenly Principles, binding their remaining days to their Delusions and burning as brightly as stars.
...Of course, many within the Fatui are simply consumed by power and are simple sadists — nor are these states necessarily in conflict.

The woman whose real name was Rosalyne-Kruzchka Lohefalter may have once led a more innocent, naive existence.
But that was before her eyes were filled with a raging fire, and her innocent days were burned away. Before the icy Delusion extinguished the flaming tongues that ever gnawed her. Before the frozen might that protected her was shattered by the eternal outlander, unbound yet no less determined than she was, causing the flames to burst forth once more...

list.name: Consommé ai tre sapori
list.desc: A neatly arranged dish. The Ham, Fowl, and Bamboo Shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.

list.name: Yaksha: Gli Adepti guardiani
list.desc: A volume out of the "Wonders and Folklore of Liyue" collection, which serves as Liyue's own version of "Tour of the Land of Liyue," an encyclopedia of folk beliefs and customs by Masudi, a scholar from Sumeru. Due to the archaic nature of the author's writing style, it was largely dismissed by the public and publishers alike. "Yakshas: The Guardian Adepti" introduces the readers to the various yakshas who fought side-by-side with the Geo Archon.

list.name: Omamori della fortuna
list.desc: An omamori that Thoma gave you. It is said to be able to bring good luck.

list.name: Per cortesia, Kitsune Guuji?
list.desc: A popular light novel in Inazuma which tells the story of the "good-for-nothing" Shogun and the "good-at-everything" Kitsune Guuji. The novel is in the same collection as "Shogun Almighty: Reborn as Raiden With Unlimited Power," but not by the same author. What they share in common, however, is their popularity.

list.name: Acchiappaventi
list.desc:
A bottle that is able to hold Anemograna and use their energy to generate wind currents.
This item was designed by Knights of Favonius scholars to help the Knights on their scouting expeditions and travels by affording them the ability to better use the blessings of the Anemo God.
In order to take advantage of its wind currents with a wind glider, however, you technically need a gliding license — this has prevented it from becoming widely used, at least legally anyway.

list.name: Lettera di Ladro di stelle
list.desc: Letter left by Starsnatcher

list.name: Rugiada del ripudio
list.desc:
Una strana goccia d'acqua rilasciata dal collasso di un'Ipostasi di Hydro.
Ha delle forti proprietà respingenti, e ciò costituisce anche la base di uno dei modelli d'attacco dell'Ipostasi di Hydro. Si dice che l'acqua contenga i ricordi e la forza di volontà, e che questi possano crescere quando i corpi d'acqua si fondono insieme. Tuttavia, le onde evocate dall'Ipostasi di Hydro sono incompatibili con le correnti che scorrono sopra e sotto la terra. Anche se dovesse fluire nelle acque più pure di Petrichor, questa goccia d'acqua resisterà all'assimilazione esercitata dall'ambiente circostante con la stessa forza del mercurio.

list.name: Guida di viaggio di Teyvat: Liyue
list.desc: A magazine by the Adventurers' Guild. Each issue introduces great sceneries across Teyvat. This issue includes a short traveling diary of Alice the Traveler in Liyue.

list.name: Guida di viaggio di Teyvat: Inazuma
list.desc: A magazine by the Adventurers' Guild. Each issue introduces great sceneries across Teyvat. This issue includes a short traveling diary of Alice the Traveler in Inazuma.

list.name: Guida di viaggio di Teyvat: Mondstadt
list.desc: A magazine by the Adventurers' Guild. Each issue introduces great sceneries across Teyvat. This issue includes a short traveling diary of Alice the Traveler on her experiences in Mondstadt.

list.name: Uovo scottato di Teyvat
list.desc:
La specialità di Bennett. Per qualche motivo, ogni singolo uovo è un po' bruciato ai bordi.

Tuttavia, è proprio la croccante bruciatura che conferisce un sapore completamente nuovo al piatto.

list.name: Uovo fritto di Teyvat
list.desc: An egg fried on one side. The yolk flows out nicely when broken. So satisfying.

list.name: Pizza rinvigorente
list.desc: Jean's specialty. This pizza almost seems more art than food. Just one slice is enough to have you raring to go. Is this what keeps Jean working so hard?

list.name: Pollo rock 'n' roll!
list.desc: Xinyan's specialty. Its demonic appearance hides an absolutely demonic spiciness. Eat it, tear up, eat some more, and don't stop till you drop! Surely only a demon could have invented such a dish!

list.name: Mora
list.desc: Moneta comune. La lingua compresa da tutti.

list.name: Moranino
list.desc: A large hunk of minced meat packaged inside a pastry. When you split the pastry in two, minced meat spills out. The taste of meat grease is all but gone, and the baking process has brought out the sweetness of the pastry. Such pastries are usually stamped with the word "Mora," all the better to represent wealth and fortune.

list.name: Emblema del corvo dorato
list.desc: Un emblema con un corvo che rappresenta l'orgoglio e il principio guida dei Cacciatori di tesori. Che sia nascosto tra le vastità della terra o nelle profondità dell'oceano, finché ci saranno tesori da inseguire, lo spirito dei Cacciatori di tesori, che non si fermerà dinanzi a nulla per ottenerli, non morirà mai.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Fiala esotermica
list.desc:
Upon use, emits heat for a short period over a small area, diminishing the effect of Sheer Cold.
Warming Seelie have evolved in response to the extreme change in temperature to give the comfort of warmth to those who seek it. This convenient gadget was originally crafted by those who struggled to survive in the snowy mountains in imitation of such evolved Seelie.

list.name: Lettera di raccomandazione per l'Akademiya
list.desc:
This letter, carefully crafted, and it is sealed in the name of "Ecologist Khedive Pursina."
You got this as a gift from Khedive. He claims that this is even more precious than gold, and can gain you the help of the House of Purbiruni.
Khedive himself believes monetary remuneration to be something of an insult... Hopefully, this doesn't prove to be a trend with people from Sumeru.

list.name: Piatto nefasto
list.desc: This is supposed to be Bennett's specialty dish, but you can sense that this dish emanates a strange feeling of... misfortune?

list.name: Geoculus
list.desc: A substance that has accumulated intense Geo energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

list.name: Electroculus
list.desc: A substance that has accumulated intense Electro energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

list.name: Anemoculus
list.desc: A substance that has accumulated intense Anemo energy. Offer it to the Statue and help reinstate the power it has lost over the years.

list.name: Tofu all'orchidea
list.desc: A dish that is a test of one's knifework. All the ingredients were sliced into ribbons in a single go, and after being washed, they were placed into the broth and cooked till they floated. The resulting flavor is light and fresh, and would not be out of place as a chef's recommendation in a Liyue restaurant.

list.name: Zuppa di germogli di bambù cotti a fuoco lento
list.desc: La specialità di Zhongli. Il prosciutto è stato selezionato secondo gli standard selezionati culinari del padiglione Yuehai. La carne fresca è pancetta di maiale, cacciato di recente nel Villaggio Acquachiara, mentre i germogli di bambù sono i più fritti che si possono trovare nel Villaggio di Qingce. Il tutto è stato cotto lentamente con molta cura e con grande tecnica: il suo gusto così "unico" può essere condiviso solo con coloro che sono in grado di apprezzarlo.

list.name: Nuove cronache delle sei kitsune (I)
list.desc: The story of the "Black Fox" Itaru was actually the third volume in the original "Urakusai's Chronicles of the Six Kitsune." It appears at the front of this edition due to the writer's personal preference.

list.name: Nuove cronache delle sei kitsune (III)
list.desc: In the 500-year-old "Urakusai's Chronicles of the Six Kitsune," Youzan and Yui went on to have their own tales. But at this time, the mother-daughter pair are still reliant on Itaru to rescue them.

list.name: Nuove cronache delle sei kitsune (II)
list.desc: This volume recounts the clash between "Black Fox Itaru" and the "Twin Oni of Tokaku." This tale was missing from the original text, but it was fortunately rediscovered at a later date. It is presented here in an edited form.

list.name: Nuove cronache delle sei kitsune (V)
list.desc: Commentary regarding ancient matters that was specially added to the "New Chronicles of the Six Kitsune." If you find it an insipid, monotonous slog, dear reader, you may skip this volume. But as far as the author is concerned, this is one waste of words and emotion that cannot be avoided.

list.name: Nuove cronache delle sei kitsune (IV)
list.desc: This is the tensest tale of the series, said to have been written by Urakusai upon his return from Liyue. It is featured in full in this writer's adaptation.

list.name: Nuove cronache delle sei kitsune (Prologo)
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/New Chronicles of the Six Kitsune: Prologue_icon.png
list.desc: Stories about memories are always closely intertwined with transience. This book is not all-new, but is an adaptation of "Urakusai's Chronicles of the Six Kitsune."

list.name: Emblema della recluta
list.desc: Un emblema per identificare le reclute. Viene da chiedersi cosa avessero in testa coloro che si sono uniti alla macchina da guerra dei Fatui.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Carne fresca
list.desc: Food that Thoma has prepared for the stray cats and dogs. This should go like hotcakes.

list.name: Pesce fresco
list.desc: Food that Thoma has prepared for the stray cats and dogs. A slightly fishy smell wafts off it.

list.name: Voltacristallo radioso 1
list.desc: This wondrous crystal contains a certain rhythm, like something beautiful woven from delicate silk. These items can be found throughout the mainland or from merchants who collect curios. The tune held within this crystal can be revivified in your Serenitea Pot using either "Euphonium Unbound: Winding" or "Euphonium Unbound: Soaring." The tune contained within this Radiant Spincrystal is the "Dawn Winery Theme."

list.name: Voltacristallo radioso 33
list.desc: Questo meraviglioso critallo cotiene un certo ritmo, come una meraviglia intessuta con della seta delicata. Questi oggetti sono sparsi per tutto il continente o si possono reperire dai mercanti che collezionano rarità. La melodia contenuta all'interno del cristallo può essere ravvivata nella Serenteiera usando Eufonio libero Sinuosità o Eufonio libero Crescendo. La melodia contenuta all'interno di questo Voltacristallo radioso è Flow of Mildness.

list.name: Voltacristallo radioso 57
list.desc: This wondrous crystal contains a certain rhythm, like something beautiful woven from delicate silk. These items can be found throughout the mainland or from merchants who collect curios. The tune held within this crystal can be revivified in your Serenitea Pot using either "Euphonium Unbound: Winding" or "Euphonium Unbound: Soaring." The tune contained within this Radiant Spincrystal is "Scarred Island."

list.name: Voltacristallo radioso 61
list.desc: Questo meraviglioso cristallo contiene un certo ritmo, come una meraviglia intessuta con della sta delicata. Questi oggetti sono spersi per tutto il continente o si possono reperire dai mercanti che collezionano rarità. La melodia contenuta all'interno del cristallo può essere ravvivata nella Serenteiera usando Eufonio libero Sinuosità o Eufonio libero Crescendo. La melodia contenuta all'interno di questo Voltacristallo radioso è Illuminated Coral Palace.

list.name: Voltacristallo radioso 67
list.desc: Questo meraviglioso cristallo contiene un certo ritmo, come una meraviglia intessuta con della seta delicata. Questi oggetti sono sparsi per tutto il continente o si possono reperire dai mercanti che collezionano rarità. La melodia contenuta all'interno del cristallo può essere ravvivata nella Serenteiera usando Eufonio libero Sinuosità o Eufonio libero Crescendo. La melodia contenuta all'interno di questo Voltacristallo radioso è Ruu's Melody.

list.name: Polvere stellare senza padrone
list.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

list.name: Luce stellare senza padrone
list.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Starglitter of destiny. Perhaps it can light up other corners of the universe.

list.name: Prima del sole e della luna
list.desc: Un racconto che è stato vietato alla gente comune. Lo scritto unisce elementi storici ad altri fiabeschi, narrando gli eventi dalla creazione del mondo fino alla nascita del Dainichi Mikoshi.

list.name: Tramontino
list.desc: Un frutto carnoso, bello come il tramonto, che abbonda in tutta Teyvat. Dal sapore dolciastro e dall'elevato contenuto energetico.

list.name: Taiyaki
list.desc: A snack shaped like a snapper. The crisp exterior wraps the sweet filling within and is very popular amongst Inazumans. It is said that in the beginning, this was just a cylindrical snack, but constant improvements wound up shaping it into the cutesy image of a fish.

list.name: Uova di luna piena
list.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The egg has been beaten into the flour to form a dough and the shrimp and fish have been diced, minced, and packaged into the shape of a teacup, before being garnished with whole shrimp and steamed in a pot. The resulting design is like that of clouds embracing the moon, hence the name Fullmoon Egg.

list.name: Unguento della vista
list.desc:
Materiale di miglioramento specifico per Occhio del giuramento.
L'olio speciale dell'unagi degli abissi, che un tempo veniva usato per conservare i manufatti sacri di Enkanomiya, è stato accuratamente elaborato allo scopo di rendere quest'occhio splendente davvero molto luminoso.

list.name: Astrofungo
list.desc: A fungus with a cap that resembles a five-pointed star. It is quite hardy indeed. Once it matures, the center of the cap will split open.

list.name: Conchistella
list.desc: Un tipo di conchiglia vuota portata a riva dalle maree. Avvicinala al tuo orecchio e ascolterai il dolce richiamo del mare.

list.name: Argento astrale
list.desc: Un prezioso minerale raro formato dalle codizioni geografiche uniche e dalle linee geomantiche del Picco del Drago.

list.name: Statuetta misteriosa
list.desc:
An idol made in the likeness of some unknown person.
Even though this carving has seen many years pass, it still has not been damaged in any way. It seems that its previous owner must have cherished it like some holy icon.

list.name: Fiore cristallino
list.desc:
Un cristallo di ghiaccio di straordinaria purezza che si è creato nella gelida fioritura di un'Ipostasi di Cryo.
Questi cristalli gelidi continueranno a crescere secondo le loro fredde e rigide leggi, finché un giorno un fiore invernale sboccerà e congelerà tutto. Forse il tempo stagnante, quel grembo che non si scongela mai, è l'essenza di questo fiore eterno.

list.name: Midollo cristallino
list.desc: Un cristallo che contiene una scheggia di potere del Tatarigami. Aggiungere questo materiale durante la fusione aumenterà notevolmente la forza e la resistenza dei metalli.

list.name: Nucleo cristallino
list.desc: The core of a crystal butterfly. It absorbs elemental energy that has escaped into the atmosphere.

list.name: Corona della saggezza
list.desc:
Prezioso materiale per l'aumento di livello dei talenti.
