Nei tempi antichi, era un oggetto che serviva a conservare e trasmettere la conoscenza. Ora, la conoscenza si trova nei testi antichi e nelle profonde riflessioni. Tuttavia, questa Corona della saggezza è ancora in grado di trasmettere parte del suo potere e della sua conoscenza a chi la indossa.

list.name: Briglia dorata opaca
list.desc: The hereditary national treasure of Byakuyakoku, but it has lost all of its own power. This was done to prevent thieves who have entered through alternative means from seeing its value.

list.name: Gemma d'ametista Vajrada
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione dei personaggi.
"Questo corpo è il più nobile e il più illustre di tutto il mondo.
Dovrebbe detenere il potere assoluto su questo mondo.
Un giorno promise alla sua gente un sogno: l'eternità immutabile."

list.name: Pezzo d'ametista Vajrada
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione dei personaggi.
"Questo corpo è il più nobile e il più illustre di tutto il mondo.
Dovrebbe detenere il potere assoluto su questo mondo."

list.name: Frammento d'ametista Vajrada
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione dei personaggi.
"Questo corpo è il più nobile e il più illustre di tutto il mondo."

list.name: Scheggia d'ametista Vajrada
list.desc: Materiale d'ascensione personaggi.

list.name: Tortino lunare
list.desc: A traditional staple from Mondstadt. Not only is the pickled meat within deeply flavorful, but the meringue has also maintained its sweetness and moisture through the baking process. This dish is not to be missed at any festival in Mondstadt.

list.name: Chiave delle Profondità seleniche
list.desc: A strange treasure with an awkward name. It is said to have been forged from the blood of Watatsumi Omikami.

list.name: Pila ordinata di barili in abete rosso
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Neat Stack of Fir Kegs.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Piatto micioso rinvigorente di Kiminami Anna
list.desc: An Invigorating Kitty Meal made personally by Kiminami Anna. You're not certain if Neko will like it or not...

list.name: Maushiro
list.desc:
An item that Sumida tasked you to find.
You found this Maushiro on Tsurumi Island, and it seems to be a traditional instrument around these parts.
That said, it should have been at least a few thousand years since Tsurumi Island last played host to any civilization at all.

list.name: Giada inesperta
list.desc: Una sostanza cristallina presa da un Geosauro primordiale. All'interno è contenuto il potenziale per diventare un drago. Questi cristalli opachi sono precipitati all'interno dei corpi degli Elementosauri che dormono sulle montagne. Secondo la mitologia di Liyue, questi cristalli raccoglieranno potere per molti anni fino a quando, alla fine, rimpiazzeranno il loro cuore originale, e l'Elementosauro diventerà un vero drago, in grado di scuotere le montagne e spaccare il mondo.

list.name: Torii scarlatto Via della restaurazione
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Scarlet Torii Gate: Way of Restoration.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Torii scarlatto Porta del silenzio
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Scarlet Torii Gate: Door of Silence.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Legno d'abete rosso
list.desc:
Wood from the tree known as "Faber's Fir." Widely used for its fine quality and attractive grain.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Mandorla
list.desc: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

list.name: Tofu di mandorle
list.desc: A dessert made out of almond. It has a silky-smooth texture with a long-lasting aroma of almond. It's named tofu only because of its tofu-like shape.

list.name: Vieni a prenderlo!
list.desc: A dish made out of a luxurious variety of ingredients. There is no great refinement in the making of this food, and it appears in Liyue often during festival season. Whenever this dish is served up, the person at the head of the table will invite everyone to dig in, saying "Come on, eat, eat," hence the name.

list.name: Borsa di Mora di Teucer
list.desc:
A very hefty bag of cash that Teucer was all too eager to offload onto you... One wonders what sort of family this Snezhnayan kid comes from.
The face value of each of these gold coins is very large, but they can be redeemed for smaller change at the Northland Bank.

list.name: Lettera dell'Ordine dell'Abisso
list.desc: Seems to be a declaration of war from the Abyss Order to the "Darknight Hero." Many key phrases have been redacted.

list.name: Legno di pino
list.desc:
Timber obtained from pines. Its color and grain are nothing to write home about, but its unpretentious nature is elegant in its own right. The wood is very sturdy as well. In able hands, its products should be able to resist moth and rot alike.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Pigna
list.desc: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

list.name: Matsutake
list.desc: A rare fungus that generally grows on or near pine trees. Its delicate aroma gives away its location.

list.name: Involtini di carne ai matsutake
list.desc: A pan-fried meat dish. Ground meat is put on the Matsutake and gently pan-fried on low heat so the Matsutake can fully take in the aromatic juice of the meat. It's a mouthwatering delicacy in all of its glory.

list.name: Pesce scoiattolo
list.desc: A hard-to-prepare fish dish. The fish is first completely deboned before crisscross cuts are made on the skin. The fish is then coated in flour and deep-fried to a golden-brown color, then served with ketchup drizzled on top. It is tender and juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside. The dish resembles a squirrel's tail to a certain degree, hence the name.

list.name: Nucleo di gelo
list.desc:
Il nucleo esposto di un Regisreptus di Cryo sconfitto. Contiene al suo interno energia pura di Cryo.
L'energia e i pensieri che si gonfiano dentro la terra alla fine spunteranno in superficie. Persino il gelo silenzioso e mortale si attaccherà agli esseri viventi sul terreno, trasformando anche la normale vegetazione, come le viti, in enormi e feroci predatori.

list.name: Pesca speciale
list.desc: La specialità di Tartaglia. Sembra una bestia intrappolata che si dimena in un oceano di sangue e agonizza emettendo un verso impercettibile... Ma Tartaglia sorride e spiega che è una creatura che ha pescato in mare, a cui ha poi aggiunto dei prodotti tipici delle sue parti.

list.name: Emblema di Rinzou
list.desc: A signet left behind by the great pirate Rinzou as proof of a glorious life of adventure.

list.name: Canna da pesca selvaggia
list.desc: A rather pedestrian-looking wooden fishing rod. Apart from being quite sturdy, even to point where you could use it for self-defense, it lacks any sort of special features. But the old adage holds true — "the novice's rod shall be the tent-pole of their veterancy." Even the greatest of anglers must surely have started with this simple implement.

list.name: Selezione di ballate: Brezza nella foresta
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Breeze Amidst the Forest - Ballad Selection Excerpt_icon.png
list.desc: Una raccolta di ballate di Mondstadt, registrate, redatte e arrangiate dagli studiosi nei secoli addietro.

list.name: Supplemento Brezza nella foresta: Il tomo del drago
list.desc:
Un supplemento della raccolta di ballate Brezza nella foresta, con brani tratti da varie fonti.

Narra la storia del drago di Mondstadt.

list.name: Sacchi Fatiche del fruttivendolo
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making the Fruit Seller's Toil.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Sacchi Attenzione del fruttivendolo
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making the Fruit Seller's Caution.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Marmellata
list.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

list.name: Esca di pasta di frutta
list.desc:
A very commonly-seen bait made from mashing, fermenting, and kneading Sunsettias and Wheat together. It atomizes very quickly upon hitting the water and exerts an incredible attraction on small fish. Due to the ease of its making, cheap price, and its excellent efficacy, it has also been jokingly called the "Fisher's Trusty Treasure."

Suitable for catching Medakas, Dawncatchers, and Crystalfish.

list.name: Spiedino di frutta
list.desc: Kaeya's specialty. A chewy skewer with a rich sweet aftertaste. Wait... Is this really the smell of fruit?

list.name: Legno d'acero
list.desc:
Timber from the Amur Maple. Excellent quality wood with a fine color and texture.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Segnale stradale in legno morto
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Deadwood Road Sign.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Un biglietto lasciato da qualcuno
list.desc: A special fortune slip that a certain person left behind. A certain location is recorded within. This may have something to do with Gendou Ringo's disappearance.

list.name: Emblema insanguinato del sergente
list.desc: The bloodied and muddied insignia of a Fatui sergeant. You have no idea how it ended up in the depths of The Chasm.

list.name: Lettera di Lyudochka
list.desc:
The letter that Lyudochka asked someone from Yae Publishing House to pass on to you. It contains her reasons for leaving without saying why. However, whether you will accept her reasons for departing or not is a different story.
It was you who discovered her presence and changed her fate... Might you be able to do still more to change this ending for the better?

list.name: Sacchetto di Mora di Lyudochka
list.desc: The Mora purse that Lyudochka left behind. It contains a decent sum of Mora, but even Paimon doesn't want to use it.

list.name: Omikuji di Lyudochka
list.desc:
A specially made fortune slip that describes how your luck will be like today. There is nothing different about this Fortune Slip, save for the fact that you used it to open Lyudochka's heart.
Now, this Fortune Slip has returned to your hands, along with her heartfelt blessings. If you've got the time, why not go to the Grand Narukami Shrine to see her?

list.name: Diagramma della spada del clan Saimon
list.desc: The Saimon Clan possessed this diagram of how to make the Amenoma Kageuchi (Sword). You can use it to master art of making this weapon.

list.name: Angolo del recinto Vista sicura
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Fence Corner: Long Watch.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Bacca
list.desc: Small, brightly-colored fruit. They can be found everywhere, and the taste of them wipes the fatigue of a long journey away.

list.name: Mizu manju alle bacche
list.desc: A crystal-clear snack. The transparent skin wraps the yellow filling. It is said that some vendors will put these snacks into a small clay bowl and immerse it in water to ensure that the cool mouthfeel is retained. This dish is as transparent as water, but it will not be washed away by flowing water — this is probably the origin of the name.

list.name: Esplosione di bacche e menta
list.desc: A freshly squeezed, fashionable, and fruity non-alcoholic beverage. A refreshing burst of Mint with Berries to sweeten the deal, it has an exquisite aroma.

list.name: Legno di betulla
list.desc:
Timber obtained from birches. It is easy to work with and produces smooth cuts. Furniture made using such wood is both beautiful and durable.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Cancello principale del cortile in betulla
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Birch Main Courtyard Gate.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Sakura onirico
list.desc:
You held a single sakura petal in your hand before leaving Raiden Makoto's realm of consciousness.
Its existence is a mystery. It appears no different from ordinary sakura petals, and there it silently sits in your storage just like any of the others. But you can no longer touch it, nor can you feel its weight or warmth. When an object loses any of the attributes that one would normally ascribe to it, how can its "existence" be proven for sure?
As you think back on the many sights the petal must have witnessed in the past, a certain guess comes to mind: that which sustains this sakura petal's existence must be someone's will. But as to who this person is, and whether they are intentionally or unintentionally keeping this petal in existence, neither can be known. Nor can you prove whether that willpower is one derived from yearning, trust, or gratitude.
Perhaps, when "that person's will" changes, so too will this sakura petal disappear.
Just to be safe, it might be best to check back from time to time and see if it still exists.

list.name: Legno onirico
list.desc:
Timber obtained from Sakura Trees. Exquisite in quality and full of moisture, people say that it can lull people into dreams as sweet as the warm spring.
Can be used to create furnishings.

list.name: Pennelli di Vermeer
list.desc: Around five paintbrushes of different lengths and widths, wrapped in a cloth and stored in a box. The artist clearly takes excellent care of them.

list.name: Pitture di Vermeer
list.desc: Half a box of paints of different colors. The bottle of white paint seems bigger than the others.

list.name: Ombra del guerriero
list.desc:
A fragment of power that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is the product of a will to fight that has been honed over countless slaughters.
If humans do indeed have destinies, then his must surely have been twisted by such deeds. Why else, then, would he always be at the heart of every conflict?

list.name: Lettera stracciata
list.desc: Someone's private thoughts are written in this tattered letter. Unfortunately, the years have eaten away at the words that were penned until they became blurred, and if not for someone having dug it up, these past events may have forever slept under the soil.

list.name: Taccuino rovinato
list.desc: A ragged notebook you found in the village. It records some old happens that happened to people long ago, now buried by the passage of time.

list.name: Pezzo di Cristallo
list.desc: Un cristallo grezzo. Solo un artigiano professionista può farne emergere il vero valore.

list.name: Prisma di cristallo
list.desc:
A prism that can bend light.
Illusory images can be made using such prisms, giving such devices — in a manner of speaking — the power to sway human hearts.

list.name: Gamberetti cristallini
list.desc: One of Liyue's traditional snacks. The stuffing is taken from whole fresh shrimp, and the glistening quality of the flour can be guessed at from the translucence of the outer skin. Has a springy, tasty chew.

list.name: Stufato di persico a dorso scuro
list.desc: A poached fish dish. The fresh and tasty fish fillets are tender and juicy. The secret to this recipe is adding powdered Violetgrass into the heated oil to give the dish that aromatic scent. It's spicy, but not too spicy.

list.name: Fede nell'eternità
list.desc: Kujou Sara's specialty. Forget calling it a dish, this is really more like a snack. The sweet, fluffy flavor really doesn't seem to suit Sara's own preferences. Wait a moment. That symbol on the snack — does this have to do with a certain other person's tastes instead?

list.name: Incenso perenne
list.desc:
A traditional incense fit for the Rite of Parting, worth 2,990,000 Mora.
There are some things in this world whose value can only be appreciated by those who understand them. Perhaps Everlasting Incense is one such thing...?

list.name: Ravioli squisiti
list.desc: Xingqiu's specialty. This dish's almost artisan appearance makes one almost reluctant to tuck in. But once you get a taste, its fresh, light and lovely sweetness will make the dish hard to put down.... Hang on a moment. Did he throw the carrots out, by any chance?

list.name: Maschera sporca
list.desc:
Una maschera d'osso ricoperta di macchie non identificabili, che emana un odore misterioso.

Eppure tale è la devozione degli Hilichurl verso le maschere che la indosseranno ugualmente.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Dente di drago vitalizzato
list.desc: A Dragontooth infused with vitality. Just its luster and texture are enough to make one uneasy...

list.name: Balla di fieno pesante
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Heavy Hay Bale.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Leggenda di una spada (I)
list.desc: Nel mezzo di un mare di stelle che ruotano al contrario, sulla superficie del pianeta hanno luogo guerre secolari... È con questa grandiosa apertura che inizia un nuovo racconto eroico!

list.name: Leggenda di una spada (III)
list.desc: Nel mezzo di un mare di stelle che ruotano al contrario è presente un arcipelago di piccole isole, ognuna con la sua storia caratterizzata da racconti eroici e curiosi allo stesso tempo. Questo racconto eroico è ambientato al tempo dello Shogunato di Suruga.

list.name: Leggenda di una spada (II)
list.desc: Nel mezzo di un mare di stelle che ruotano al contrario, qualsiasi battaglia è solamente un'increspatura nel silenzio per coloro che si trovano sulla riva... Ma per i guerrieri nella mischia, la guerra è l'unica cosa che esiste.

list.name: Leggenda di una spada (V)
list.desc: Nel mezzo di un mare di stelle che ruotano al contrario, in un villaggio indefinito in un angolo sperduto dell'arcipelago di isole, un ronin caduto in disgrazia stipula un'alleanza con un gruppo di contadini. La grande battaglia con i banditi si avvicina...

list.name: Leggenda di una spada (VI)
list.desc: "Essenzialmente, la grande battaglia nello spazio non è differente dal conflitto armato tra comuni cittadini, che avvenne dieci anni fa su quel pianeta brullo". Presto, il nome di quell'uomo sarà conosciuto in tutta la galassia, come quello dell'Imperatore.

list.name: Leggenda di una spada (IV)
list.desc: C'è un detto a Inazuma: "Cosa sono i banditi se non i figli della guerra?" In un'era di tumulti, anche un campo agricolo diventa teatro di battaglia... Scopri come continua il racconto nell'ultimo volume di Leggenda di una spada!

list.name: Corno pesante
list.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

list.name: Biglietto di Muning
list.desc: The Ministry representative Muning gave you this note. Despite its short length, the word "prohibited" appears 8 times. If you give this to an adventure named Zhiqiong, you will receive the aid you need.

list.name: Ignoto avvenire
list.desc: Qiqi's specialty. The neat rows of ingredients seem at once exotic and delicious, and Baizhu says that Qiqi has spent a long time creating this dish. Still, once one considers that Qiqi has no sense of taste, just putting chopsticks to the food is going to take some courage.

list.name: Lettera ingiallita
list.desc: A letter unearthed from beneath a tree in Konda Village. It seems to convey a certain person's hopes.

list.name: Cipolla
list.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

list.name: Passepartout
list.desc:
A realm dispatch that you obtained from Tubby. It seems to be able to allow your companions to come and go in your realm as they please...
After acquiring this item, you can invite companions to reside in your Serenitea Pot from the Placement Screen.

list.name: Piatto micioso rinvigorente
list.desc: This main dish looks rather cute. With Kiminami Anna's help, this dish was made with the tastes of provisional head priestess Neko in mind. Although it does not quite match the flavor that Hibiki used to produce, Lady Neko seems rather pleased with your work nonetheless. Due to the lack of spices, humans might find this dish a tad on the plain side.

list.name: Pietraluce
list.desc:
A special stone mined from the depths of The Chasm. It is said that it has catalytic properties.
It almost blazes with light in the gloomy mines, but it loses all such effects the moment one leaves The Chasm.
It seems to have other unique properties as well that have yet to be discovered.

list.name: Minerale di Pietraluce
list.desc: The raw ore from which Lumenstone may be found. If processed properly, it can be used to strengthen the Lumenstone Adjuvant you have. Why not hit Jinwu up and ask her?

list.name: Catalizzatore di Pietraluce
list.desc:
When equipped in The Chasm's Underground Mines, this precious crystal can provide illumination.

It has many similarities to the Glazed Sand Crystal that may only be found within The Chasm, but it stores even greater power within it.
May it be as a sun in your palm, lighting the way through the lightless tunnels and bringing comfort where all is dark.

list.name: Consiglio del vagabondo
list.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 1000 EXP.
These experiences are still beneficial even if one does not live in Teyvat.

list.name: Resina condensata
list.desc:
You can hold no more than 5 at a time.
Condensed tree resin that can be used instead of Original Resin to revitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms to receive greater rewards.
Crystal filled with immense energy.
The silver-white Irminsul trees and blossoms are connected to ley lines that have become blocked over time. The energy contained in tree resin can purify the obstructing substance.

list.name: Cassetta degli attrezzi per il Cavalcaonde
list.desc:
A toolbox filled with all manner of items that can be used to repair the damage done to a Waverider.
·Restores 50% of a Waverider's structural integrity.
·Has a 90s cooldown.

list.name: Racconti tra le onde: Bassa marea
list.desc: Finally, when the tempest eased and the ocean surface was tranquil once more, the soft wind played a poignant homecoming tune...

list.name: Racconti tra le onde: Alta marea
list.desc: The legendary tale of an anonymous seafarer set in a time when Liyue was plagued by sea monsters.

list.name: Racconti tra le onde: Tempesta selvaggia
list.desc: To the never-ending tune of the ocean, the seafarer fought against the phenomenal foe of fate, fighting to the bitter end...

list.name: Guscio spettrale
list.desc:
Un nucleo energetico che permette agli Spettri di fluttuare. Contiene una piccola quantità d'energia elementale.

La maggior parte del resto si è già dispersa.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Cuore spettrale
list.desc:
Un nucleo energetico che permette agli Spettri di fluttuare.
Queste forme di vita elementali hanno strani modelli comportamentali e aumentano periodicamente di numero prima di scomparire.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Nucleo spettrale
list.desc:
Un nucleo energetico completo che a volte può essere trovato dopo aver sconfitto gli Spettri.

C'è un dibattito in corso tra coloro che dividono il mondo solo tra vincitori e sconfitti: chi fluttua meglio, uno Spettro o un Melmoso di Anemo?

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Frammento di Plaustrite
list.desc:
Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
A mysterious shard of elemental rock that can float by itself. It is the secret to the flying lanterns. It is also said to be the thing that powers the Jade Chamber's floating mechanism.

list.name: Consommé ai tre sapori del Festival delle lanterne
list.desc: Traditional cuisine made to celebrate Lantern Rite. The ham, fowl, and bamboo shoots have been sliced into threads of equal length, and they've been laid out neatly in the soup bowl after being steamed at high heat, before being covered in consommé. The layers are distinct, and the mouthfeel is salty yet fresh.

list.name: Vieni a prenderlo! speciale del Festival delle lanterne
list.desc: Traditional cuisine made to celebrate Lantern Rite. There is no great refinement in the making of this food, and it appears in Liyue often during festival season. Whenever this dish is served up, the person at the head of the table will invite everyone to dig in, saying "Come on, eat, eat," hence the name.

list.name: Polpette di ravanello fritte del Festival delle lanterne
list.desc: Traditional cuisine made to celebrate Lantern Rite. Fragrant and crispy. Make sure to eat them while they're hot!

list.name: Pesce corno alla griglia del Festival delle lanterne
list.desc: Traditional cuisine made to celebrate Lantern Rite. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly seasoned and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.

list.name: Tagliolini di montagna del Festival delle lanterne
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Lantern Rite Special Noodles with Mountain Delicacies_icon.png
list.desc: Traditional cuisine made to celebrate Lantern Rite. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.

list.name: Zuppa di gemme speciale del Festival delle lanterne
list.desc: Traditional cuisine made to celebrate Lantern Rite. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.

list.name: Zuppa di semi di loto e uova d'uccello speciale del Festival delle lanterne
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Lantern Rite Special Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup_icon.png
list.desc: Traditional cuisine made to celebrate Lantern Rite. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.

list.name: Ganoderma marino
list.desc: Una specie di pianta che cresce solo in alcune regioni e isole oceaniche. Sebbene ricordi un fungo di qualche tipo, deriva da una sostanza secreta da certi organismi invertebrati.

list.name: Balsamo dell'Imperatore
list.desc:
Un materiale di miglioramento specifico per Sovrano marino.
La fragranza intensa di questa crema sembra aver sigillato al suo interno lo spirito del mare. Spalmalo sul Sovrano marino per temprare questa claymore unica e renderla ancora più dura.

list.name: Alga
list.desc: A plant that grows in shallow seas. It adds a unique flavor to dishes.

list.name: Gemma di lazurite Varunada
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione dei personaggi.
"I miei ideali sono senza macchia.
Devo correggerti. La gente qui non ha peccato agli occhi degli dèi... Solo la legge e il tribunale possono giudicare.
Possono giudicare perfino me. Quindi lodate la mia grandezza e purezza".

list.name: Pezzo di lazurite Varunada
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione dei personaggi.
"I miei ideali sono senza macchia.
Devo correggerti. La gente qui non ha peccato agli occhi degli dèi..."

list.name: Frammento di lazurite Varunada
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione dei personaggi.
"I miei ideali sono senza macchia."

list.name: Scheggia di lazurite Varunada
list.desc: Materiale d'ascensione personaggi.

list.name: Campanella purificatrice
list.desc:
It is said that this magic bell was prepared specifically for adepti. Its sound rings through the air and does not fade quickly, and can be used to purify the mortal realm.
It seems to have a life of its own, even as you hold it in your hand...

list.name: Sangue contaminato
list.desc:
Substance acquired from defeating Dvalin.
A crystal imbued with the winds of antiquity as well as another occult power from within the great dragon's body.

The mighty dragon was once a captive of a cage of toxicity, woven of three poisons:
The foul blood he once ingested, the lies whispered from the Abyss, and the anguish of abandonment.
Through tears shed and songs sung, the unholy spikes that had grown on Dvalin's body were smashed to pieces, and the web that had ensnared him was torn away...
Perhaps these feats were achievable only by a free-spirited traveler from a far-away land.

list.name: Circuito del caos
list.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. Was once a logic circuit responsible for movement functions. Sadly, no one is able to make sense of how it worked.

list.name: Ingranaggio del caos
list.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin machine.
This is the energy source of that biomimetic mechanism.

list.name: Asse del caos
list.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin machine.
Even the great techniques and unknown power of this device must come to nothing should the machine that contained them ever fail to maintain structural integrity.

list.name: Nucleo del caos
list.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. The core that once drove a mechanical beast. Should you come to understand its workings and reproduce it, you could perhaps change the world.

list.name: Oculus del caos
list.desc:
Comes from a now-inactive ancient Ruin machine.
The "Ruin" part of the name comes from the areas where they are most active. However, Ruin machines actually have little in common with the detritus in which they are often found.
In the ancient past, these ruins were once part of a civilization mighty enough to almost touch the dome of the firmament, while "ruin" still waits in the deep places of the earth, awaiting the order to arise and tread all kingdoms underfoot.

list.name: Dispositivo del caos
list.desc: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. A part that once held the structure together. Its aesthetically-pleasing engineering is quite exquisite.

list.name: Qingxin
list.desc: Un fiore bianco traslucido che cresce solo sulle più alte vette rocciose. Rigetta il calore e l'umidità delle pianure per contemplare l'orizzonte da lontano.

list.name: Immagine nitida
list.desc: An image showing the state of the storage devices within the Mikage Furnace. Who knows what Xavier can glean from it...

list.name: Cuore delle limpide sorgenti (I)
list.desc: Una storia leggendaria tramandata dai cacciatori del Villaggio Acquachiara, che narra dell'incontro tra un ragazzo anonimo e una Fata della sorgente.

list.name: Cuore delle limpide sorgenti (III)
list.desc: Una storia leggendaria tramandata dai cacciatori del Villaggio Acquachiara, che narra dell'incontro tra un ragazzo anonimo e una Fata della sorgente.

list.name: Cuore delle limpide sorgenti (II)
list.desc: Una storia leggendaria tramandata dai cacciatori del Villaggio Acquachiara, che narra dell'incontro tra un ragazzo anonimo e una Fata della sorgente.

list.name: Cuore delle limpide sorgenti (IV)
list.desc: Una storia leggendaria tramandata dai cacciatori del Villaggio Acquachiara, che narra dell'incontro tra un ragazzo anonimo e una Fata della sorgente.

list.name: Gamberetti saltati
list.desc: A mild and luscious dish. The shrimp are quickly sautéed and the sauce thickened. This method of cooking is exceedingly simple and brings out the wonderful natural flavor of the shrimp meat, granting it a place in humble home-cooked dinners and lavish banquets alike.

list.name: Minerale delle profondità
list.desc: A special ore created due to the Watatsumi Goryou Matsuri. As Enkanomiya's environment has undergone extreme changes, the memories and thoughts of Watatsumi Omikami scattered throughout Enkanomiya have coalesced into medullae, which then transformed into ore.

list.name: Sfera delle profondità blu
list.desc: A strange gem left behind by a foe from the Abyss. If you look into it hard, it is almost as if you are looking into a long-borne dream shrouded by a deep fog.

list.name: Toast del pescatore
list.desc: Un toast ricoperto di cipolle. È molto popolare tra i pescatori, che infatti ne fanno delle scorte in previsione delle lunghe giornate di pesca in riva al fiume.

list.name: Pollame alla straniera
list.desc: A meat dish drizzled with sauce. The fowl is marinated before being covered in batter and fried, and a thick sauce is drizzled over it as a finishing touch. The accompanying vegetables are local produce, but the marinating methods and sauce are all imported, hence the name "imported poultry."

list.name: La leggenda di Vennessa (I)
list.desc: A popular song since the reconstruction of Mondstadt. It tells the story of Vennessa, the founder of the Knights of Favonius, in her early years as a slave in Mondstadt.

list.name: La leggenda di Vennessa (II)
list.desc: A popular song since the reconstruction of Mondstadt. It tells the story of Vennessa, the founder of the Knights of Favonius, in her early years when she met Barbatos, the Anemo Archon, as well as how she defeated the drake and overthrew the Aristocrats.

list.name: Parete della sorgente Fondamenta stabili
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Hot Spring Wall: Well-Grounded.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Parete esterna della sorgente Accesso negato
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Hot Spring Outer Wall: No Vaulting.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Paravento della sorgente Moderazione
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Hot Spring Folding Screen: Moderation.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Ingresso della sorgente Rifugio contro il freddo
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Hot Spring Foyer: Shelter from the Cold_icon.png
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Hot Spring Foyer: Shelter from the Cold.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Angolo della veranda Vista del padiglione
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Veranda Corner: Pavilion's Watch.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Insalata nutriente
list.desc: A vegetable salad. Not just steamed potatoes and fresh vegetables, but also a hard-boiled egg to top it off. Satisfying to both the eyes and stomach.

list.name: Pezzo di Aerosiderite
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione delle armi.

Quando Khaenri'ah venne distrutta, un grande peccatore creò infiniti mostri nelle cui vene scorreva un sangue oscuro e alieno. Si scatenarono in tutto il paese, distruggendo ogni cosa che incontravano. Erano delle forme di vita mutate, e quest'alterazione era causata da poteri all'infuori di questo mondo. Durin, il drago nero serpentino che attaccò Mondstadt, era uno di questi esseri mutati.

list.name: Scheggia di Aerosiderite
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione delle armi.

Le dicerie sui mostri marini sono all'ordine del giorno a Liyue, poiché l'altra sponda è una regione sconosciuta all'infuori di Teyvat. Senza la protezione dei Sette, tutto ciò che si trova all'esterno è un caos sconosciuto. Solo un potere al di là dell'ordine di Teyvat è in grado di macchiare di nero il potere di Rex Lapis.

list.name: Granello di Aerosiderite
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione delle armi.
Un giorno, una meteora nera cadde oltre il Mare di Nubi di Liyue, si dice per sconfiggere un mostro. Tuttavia, fu macchiata da un potente sangue contaminato, quindi questo oggetto non possiede più il potere puro di Rex Lapis.

list.name: Frammento di Aerosiderite
list.desc:
Materiali d'ascensione delle armi.
Le nazioni costiere di Teyvat si riferiscono con il termine Mare oscuro alla regione al di là della protezione dei Sette. Si dice che molti dèi sconfitti si rifiutarono di vivere sotto il nuovo ordine dei Sette, così fuggirono verso isole remote e divennero delle divinità malvagie. Tuttavia, il loro potere proveniva dalla stessa fonte di quello di Rex Lapis, separata da questa oscurità che tutto divora.

list.name: Risposta di Chaoxi a Cui'er
list.desc: A reply from Chaoxi to Cui'er. Judging from the sender's attitude, it's unlikely to be a particularly heartfelt letter.

list.name: Olio essenziale idratante
list.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Hydro, boosting Hydro DMG.
It's a slippery medicine for external use, able to better channel Hydro energy. It has a subtle fragrance.

list.name: Bava di Melmoso di Pyro
list.desc: The condensate of a Pyro Slime. It bears slight traces of Pyro energy.

list.name: Spaghetti al ragù fiammante
list.desc: Bolognese covered with a meat sauce. The meaty, herby aroma really gets your appetite going.

list.name: Prosciutto
list.desc: Smoked leg meat. Even the thinnest slice is packed full of flavor.

list.name: Fibra per lanterna
list.desc:
Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
This commonly encountered fibrous material can be processed into lantern wrappings so that the lanterns can float away, carrying their beautiful wishes far afield.

list.name: Materiale per lucignolo
list.desc:
Used in Lantern Rite as material with which to construct Xiao Lanterns.
The commonly encountered velvety material can be processed into lantern wicks so the lanterns can float away, carrying their beautiful wishes far afield.

list.name: Cuore di cenere
list.desc:
Un frammento deformato che contiene potenti emozioni. L'hai ottenuto sconfiggendo Signora, che ha scatenato il suo potere originale.
Nemmeno le lacrime possono estinguere le fiamme. L'agonia e la rabbia ardenti le scorrono nelle vene, colando dai suoi dotti lacrimali.
Il Primo Fatuus la trovò poco prima che il suo cuore potesse essere distrutto dalla fiamma eterna. Lui capì che solo un odio e un'ossessione più profondi potevano spegnere il fuoco che la divorava e renderla sua alleata...

list.name: Straccetti di carne saltati
list.desc: Beidou's specialty. They say that Beidou once learned some tricks from Xiangling, making some refinements and adding more flavor to this dish. If you can clean it out in one go, perhaps you might impress her.

list.name: Tramezzino al tonkatsu
list.desc: A nutritionally-balanced meal. The two bread slices clip a thick-cut katsu slab between them. The fragrant, slightly sweet-and-sour sauce is the key to preventing this meal from being too rich. A brilliant mix of outlander style and local flavor!

list.name: Polpette di ravanello fritte
list.desc: Fried Radish Balls. Fragrant and crispy. Make sure to eat them while they're hot! Said to be a recipe from Liyue.

list.name: Portamerenda
list.desc: A box of snacks that Kujou Kamaji request you bring to Hiiragi Chisato. It seems very full indeed...

list.name: Nettare del Malefiore di Pyro
list.desc: You can still feel its heat as you hold it in your hand. Can this really be used to make paint?

list.name: Olio essenziale ardente
list.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Pyro, boosting Pyro DMG.
It is made of materials that gestate Pyro, which serves to draw in Pyro energy more effectively. It also makes the user more fired-up and passionate.

list.name: Pistillo di Fiorardente
list.desc: The stamen of a fiercely burning flower. Even after being extinguished, it still emits heat.

list.name: Pesce corno alla griglia
list.desc: A fish kebab grilled over an open flame. The fish is a fresh catch straight from the harbor, lightly seasoned and swiftly grilled. Its aroma attracts the street cats. Indeed, freshness is the secret of flavor.

list.name: Bistecca
list.desc: A grilled steak. High heat has locked the juices in, giving one high expectations for when the meat is cut open.

list.name: Pizza ai funghi
list.desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm, the cheese becomes stretchy and gooey, making it extremely satisfying to eat.

list.name: Tofu all'orchidea fumante
list.desc: Oncidium Tofu made using the Supreme Cuisine Machine. One wonders what flavors this is going to have...

list.name: Carne stufata fumante
list.desc: Braised Meat made using the Supreme Cuisine Machine. Fresh and steaming hot.

list.name: Pollame affumicato
list.desc: Fowl that has been smoked. The firmness of the meat gives new texture to dishes.

list.name: Ora della fusione
list.desc:
Un certo frammento deformato che contiene un grande potere. L'hai ottenuto sconfiggendo Signora, che ha scatenato il suo potere originale.
"Ho fatto un sogno molto lungo.
Ho sognato che ci saremmo incontrati di nuovo nel mondo puro che avevamo creato.
Ma alla fine mi sono svegliata, essendo stata consumata a lungo dalle fiamme violente, mentre tu eri tornato da tempo alla terra insieme a quel sangue avvelenato.
Ma niente di tutto ciò ha più importanza. Devo andare avanti. Devo incenerire tutto ciò che è dietro di me. Devo credere in quel puro e immacolato reame eterno di cui ha parlato... che ho visto nell'Illusione che mi ha mostrato, alla fine dell'orizzonte dei sogni di Sua Maestà."

list.name: Gemma d'agata Agnidus
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione dei personaggi.

"Viaggia per un desiderio; combatti per diventare forte...

...Bruciando tra i tizzoni per un sogno.

Se la volontà permane, allora avrai ottenuto la verità".

list.name: Pezzo d'agata Agnidus
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione personaggi.

"Viaggia per un desiderio; combatti per diventare forte...

...Bruciando tra i tizzoni per un sogno."

list.name: Frammento d'agata Agnidus
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione personaggi.

"Viaggia per un desiderio; combatti per diventare forte..."

list.name: Scheggia d'agata Agnidus
list.desc: Materiale d'ascensione personaggi.

list.name: Filetto saltato
list.desc: Sliced meat flash-fried in a wok. The mild Jueyun Chili adds just the right amount of kick to the delicious aroma of the meat. Perfect as an appetizer and also goes well with rice.

list.name: Frittelle di patate a forma di zampa
list.desc: Razor's specialty. Carefully shaped to resemble a wolf's paw. You can really feel the effort he has put into trying human cooking.

list.name: Biglietto di Alrani
list.desc: The treasure is buried beneath the giant golden tree in the middle of Lingju Pass.

list.name: Latte
list.desc: Latte di mucca dolce e aromatico. Non sprecarne neanche una goccia, neanche quella rimasta sulle tue labbra.

list.name: Punta di freccia robusta
list.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

list.name: Chiave della cella
list.desc: A metal key that you obtained from the Fatui. It should be able to open some kind of door.

list.name: Chiave della gabbia
list.desc:
A key used to open a wooden cage.
Of course, considering what the cage is meant to do, perhaps one should call it a "key meant to lock a wooden cage" instead?

list.name: Amuleto di Makiri
list.desc: A sturdy bag that seems seawater-proof. It's full of blessing from the ancestral spirits.

list.name: Fiordolce extradolce
list.desc:
A plant with a rich, sweet fragrance that makes an excellent sweetener.
Some say plants have feelings too — show them enough care and attention, and they will strive to bloom all the more fragrantly. Sometimes, though, this will then make them the target of people who don't know how to mind their own business.

list.name: Omikuji speciale
list.desc:
A specially made fortune slip that describes how your luck will be like today. There is nothing different about this Fortune Slip, save for the fact that you got it for the fake Bamboo Slip.
Whose fortune does this Fortune Slip describe?

list.name: Ampolla speciale
list.desc: A bottle you received from Connor. It contains the key to resolving this incident.

list.name: Tofu di mandorle speciale
list.desc: The signature dish of Smiley Yanxiao, the chef of Wangshu Inn. It has a sweet taste but also retains the bitterness of the almonds. Its refreshing taste and mild fragrance shall impress even the adepti.

list.name: Fotokamera speciale
list.desc:
When used, this useful gadget can save and store the scenery before it and add a special color tone to it.
A strange device from Fontaine that will not only record sceneries but will also add special colors to the printed images. This design was made in response to "The Steambird"'s request for a Kamera that could not only reflect the environment, but also the emotions of the one taking the picture. Unfortunately, the final product could not quite match their specifications.

list.name: Bastoncino di bambù speciale
list.desc: A Bamboo Slip upon which Momoyo has applied some specially made elemental powder. Store and handle it with care! The powder has some measure of poison in it — and of course, you'll get yelled at for improper handling.

list.name: Pancake speciale
list.desc: Tea Break Pancake that has just had syrup drizzled over it. Time to serve it to the customers, and fast.

list.name: Moranino speciale
list.desc: A serving of Mora Meat. Neither Mora nor Meat will be left if it gets cold.

list.name: Vieni a prenderlo! speciale
list.desc: A Come And Get It that looks delicious. Specially-made or not, Come And Get It always tastes terrible cold.

list.name: Involtini di carne ai matsutake speciali
list.desc: Freshly-made Matsutake Meat Rolls. The person who ordered this is in for a real treat.

list.name: Stufato di persico a dorso scuro speciale
list.desc: Black-Back Perch Stew, fresh from the oven. It won't maintain its freshness for long.

list.name: Toast del pescatore speciale
list.desc: This should be finger food, but it also needs to be sent by speed courier. How odd.

list.name: Spaghetti al ragù fiammante speciali
list.desc: A freshly-served plate of Flaming Red Bolognese. It is a thing of fragile beauty.

list.name: Filetto saltato speciale
list.desc: Stir-Fried Filet prepared for Ling'guan. If it was fated to be left to cool, why stir-fry it in the first place?

list.name: Zuppa di gemme speciale
list.desc: Warm Jewelry Soup. It's practically spilling out of the bowl.

list.name: Pollo ai Fiordolci speciale
list.desc: A custom-made Sweet Madame. Such a fragile yet tempting dish is not often seen.

list.name: Ravioli di giada speciali
list.desc: A newly-completed set of Jade Parcels. It exudes a transient, fantastical aroma. If you don't send this out soon...

list.name: Zuppa di semi di loto e uova d'uccello speciale
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Special Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup_icon.png
list.desc: Lotus on the one hand, and eggs on the other. It feels like you'd be insulting the adepti if you sent this over to Jueyun Karst.

list.name: Lanterna Xiao personalizzata
list.desc: Xiao Lantern obtained from Congzi, and it has the names of the five childhood playmates inscribed upon it. May the fire pass on, and may friendship never die.

list.name: Pizza ai funghi speciale
list.desc: A pancake with ample toppings. The many rare ingredients do a strange dance around one's tongue — albeit in a good way.

list.name: Fuochi d'artificio giganti
list.desc: Yoimiya's pride and joy as the current owner of Naganohara Fireworks. It still seems to be in an experimental state. Nothing's going to go wrong... right?

list.name: Coltello sacrificale dell'usuraio
list.desc: An oddly-shaped weapon made with superior Snezhnayan technology that once belonged to a senior agent. Proper training is required for using this strange weapon.

list.name: Un cane speciale (I)
list.desc: Sometimes, feelings are like the summer rain, coming out of nowhere and catching you unprepared. A nostalgic summer story set in the age of aristocrats begins right here.

list.name: Un cane speciale (VII)
list.desc: "A good person, one who smiles as she gives out dog biscuits..." What is the true identity of the strange young woman in the familiar forest?

list.name: Un cane speciale (III)
list.desc: Even when you live in a safe city, you should watch out for the wolves that lurk in the night... Something more impossible to master than mass hypnosis is revealed within these pages.

list.name: Un cane speciale (IX)
list.desc: "What does the death of a warm spring day feel like?" So the young maiden said one morning, in defiance of all common logic. "I suppose it must feel... furry?"

list.name: Un cane speciale (II)
list.desc: Money doesn't solve all your problems, but it can certainly solve a lot of them! A young woman's summer vacation in Mondstadt opens to the melodic tune of a symphonic sum of Mora.

list.name: Un cane speciale (V)
list.desc: "Be a good dog! Yes, there's no reward for getting it right, but there's still a punishment for getting it wrong!" The witch in black makeup smirked.

list.name: Un cane speciale (VIII)
list.desc: "Heavens, I spoke ill of a witch to her face!" "Oh, what a bad boy. Still, discipline is a master's duty, so there's nothing for it~" The curtains rise on the witch's cruel secret—

list.name: Un cane speciale (VI)
list.desc: "Message From the Editor: Thank you for your support, everyone! We've managed to snag our erstwhile author from the bowels of The Cat's Tail! Although they look drunker than a sodden dandelion, continued serialization should pose no problem! We hope for your continued support from here on out as well!"

list.name: Un cane speciale (X)
list.desc: After all, none can live and still obtain release.

list.name: Un cane speciale (XI)
list.desc: "I should just stuff that noisy puppy yapper of yours..." "Woof, woof!" That day, the young maiden gave her loyal dog something precious...

list.name: Un cane speciale (IV)
list.desc: Even a dog can learn basic things like upper-class etiquette — or so insists a certain non-nonsense teacher from afar.

list.name: Olio essenziale sferzante
list.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Anemo, boosting Anemo DMG.
It has a fragrant smell. It is said that using it during your travels will make you walk as if you're riding on the wind.

list.name: Volpe giocattolo
list.desc:
The gift that Gorou got when helping Kokomi purchase books during the Irodori Festival. Gorou then gave it to you as thanks for accompanying him.
Every time you look at it, you can't help but remember the sight of every hair on Gorou's body standing on end as he heard the word "fox."

list.name: Trappola da caccia
list.desc: Used to trap beasts of a certain size. If you pay attention in the wilds to collect them, you can make one like this. Set one down, and then conceal it carefully.

list.name: Offerte delle Forre
list.desc: Offerings from The Narrows that contain a fraction of Aberaku's remnant thoughts.

list.name: Frammento di Redini della rinascita (Forre)
list.desc: A fragment of the Reins of Revival. It is made from a special material.

list.name: Ferri del Gladiatore dei denti di leone
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione delle armi.
È tipico degli umani ingigantire la storia di un eroe, al punto di esaltare i ferri che una volta lo legavano al pari di un nemico della vera libertà.
Questi ferri hanno pertanto ottenuto dei poteri straordinari.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Aspirazione del Gladiatore dei denti di leone
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione delle armi.

Vennessa poteva anche essere stata liberata dalla schiavitù, ma si ritrovò poi soggetta a molte altre forme di prigionia, anche più peggiori. Ciò che era iniziato come un dovere nei confronti della sua tribù si estese a tutta Mondstadt, poi al concetto stesso di libertà, fino a includere il mondo intero.
Quello che sperava davvero, in realtà, era che il mondo potesse diventare più forte.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Catene del Gladiatore dei denti di leone
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione delle armi.
Le catene che un tempo vincolavano la grande eroina Vennessa.
In verità, a tutti i gladiatori erano messe delle catene a quel tempo, e Vennessa era solo una dei tanti.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Manette del Gladiatore dei denti di leone
list.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione delle armi.
Vennessa non era veramente vincolata dalle sue catene. Se avesse davvero voluto, nessun ordinario vincolo fisico forgiato a Mondstadt avrebbe potuto trattenerla, perché quella terra non offriva alcun minerale di qualità eccezionale, né possedeva la fiamma divina della sua casa ancestrale.
Era vincolata solo dalla sua responsabilità di prendersi cura dei membri della sua tribù.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Farfalla infernale
list.desc:
Un frammento deformato che ospita un grande potere. L'hai ottenuto sconfiggendo Signora, che ha scatenato il suo potere originale.
Il sigillo di ghiaccio fu rotto sotto costrizione, e mentre la sua antica volontà emergeva dalla sua pallida prigione bianca e lei ricordava di nuovo il suo vecchio nome, la farfalla eterna danzava tra il sangue e i corpi in fiamme. E lei ricordò il suo passato, quando vagava per la terra, spargeva la fiamma, bruciava tutto il male... e ricordò il volto della persona che non avrebbe mai più potuto incontrare.

list.name: Coltello sacrificale del cacciatore
list.desc: A sharp alloy weapon. Though its owner has been lost, it still reflects a disturbingly cold light.

list.name: Bacheca degli annunci della taverna Coda di Gatto
list.desc: Cat's Tail Tavern Message Board

list.name: Colonna di basalto
list.desc:
Una colonna formata dal guscio di un'Ipostasi di Geo, composta da energia di Geo ad alta densità.

È una testimonianza della condizione di Geo come il più pesante degli elementi. Forse il motivo per cui un'Ipostasi di Geo crea questa colonna dal suo guscio per poi innalzarsi è perché desidera avvicinarsi al cielo, non perché vuole combattere i nemici.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Versi di Equilibrium
list.desc: Legend has that it contains ancient incantations used to pay respects to Rex Lapis and the yaksha adepti. It also serves as a historical record of the ancient belief in the Geo Archon.

list.name: Bambola giocattolo
list.desc: A toy belonging to miner Qi Ding's daughter. It looks pretty tattered and it's hard to imagine that any kid would like it. But the intricate stitch-work shows that this was once quite the pricey item.

list.name: Bancarella di giocattoli Meraviglie a non finire
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Toy Stand: Dazzling Delights.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Studio preliminare sulle credenze popolari di Sangonomiya
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/A Preliminary Study of Sangonomiya Folk Belief_icon.png
list.desc: This paper was written by Shihab Purbiruni, a scholar of modern history from Sumeru, two years before the civil war in Inazuma. It details the folk beliefs of Watatsumi Island and the Sangonomiya people, and puts forward some relatively new academic propositions.

list.name: Cronache di Sangonomiya
list.desc: Historical annals written by the famous Shogunate historian Kujou Michizane, who was known as one of the "The Three Kujou Dignitaries," or "The Great Calligrapher." It chronicles the history of Watatsumi Island in broad strokes.

list.name: Perla di corallo
list.desc: Una perla preziosa che cresce tra i coralli di Watatsumi. Emette un bagliore simile a quello della luna.

list.name: Zuppa di gemme
list.desc: A simple vegetable soup. Snapdragon, tofu, and lotus seeds are put into boiling water and simmered. Jewelry Soup earned its luxurious name from the look of the ingredients used, but contrary to its name, the soup is commonly prepared and served in ordinary households.

list.name: Racconti preziosi del Kiyoshiken Shinkageuchi (I)
list.desc: The first part of a traditional Inazuman novel. This particular volume is also known as "Shinkageuchi," and was once a restricted text. It contains a fantastical tale about the first Raiden Shogun and her kagemusha, depicting the benevolent sagacity of the first Shogun and the great valor of her kagemusha. However, due to the great popularity of another book known colloquially as "Raiden Reincarnation," many people became interested in stories of this kind. This book thus wound up being published in a haphazard manner.

list.name: Distesa di gemme
list.desc: This scroll, which seems to be a part of a larger series, belongs to the Jade Chamber's invaluable collection of written works. This volume is a dissertation on Liyue Harbor's economic policy.

list.name: Cristallo Gelovitreo
list.desc:
A glaze crystal produced in the depths of The Chasm, this special Glaze Sand Crystal ore was one of many scattered about during the battle against the giant ruin machine. Glaze Sand Crystal ore is a regional specialty of The Chasm, but this one is different from the rest.
Under the radiance of the blue crystal and the power of the Abyss, a strange spiral pattern has emerged within this stone, and it is cold, almost chilling to the touch.
This once smooth crystal has been transformed into this shape by the great might that descended from the heavens and the miasma that arose from the earth's depths — and perhaps the form it has taken is itself a warning unto mortals.
If the interaction of these forces alone could twist stone and metal thus, if that ordinary heroine was truly able to witness the end of the pitch-dark path, how would she have faced the discovery she would make?

list.name: Splendigiglio
list.desc: Un fiore antico, facilmente reperibile in tutta Liyue. Durante la fioritura, trasforma le memorie della terra nel suo profumo.

list.name: Campaviola
list.desc:
Un fiorellino dalla grande vitalità. Si dice che la sua forma protesa verso il basso riesca a
conservarne il profumo più a lungo.

list.name: Zuppa di Jinwu
list.desc:
A thick soup that Jinwu made for sick miners. It's nutritious, fragrant, and makes you feel warm inside when you drink it.
Don't let it go cold, now.

list.name: Gemma di diamante brillante
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

list.name: Pezzo di diamante brillante
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

list.name: Frammento di diamante brillante
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

list.name: Scheggia di diamante brillante
list.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Welcome to this world."

list.name: Chiave del Santuario delle Profondità di Liyue
list.desc:
A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Liyue.
These Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

list.name: Tradizioni di Liyue: Bouquet di fiori
list.desc: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

list.name: Tradizioni di Liyue: Benvenuto divino
list.desc: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

list.name: Tradizioni di Liyue: Fiordiseta
list.desc: A book on the cultures and customs of Liyue originally compiled by Fadhlan, a scholar from Sumeru residing in Liyue. It was then edited by many local scholars and published. It is one of the bestsellers in Liyue.

list.name: Fiordolce
list.desc: Particularly fragrant flowers. They can be found easily, even in the dark. Just follow the scent.

list.name: Pollo ai Fiordolci
list.desc: Honey-roasted fowl. The honey and sweet flowers come together to complement the tender fowl meat.

list.name: Sushi di gamberetti
list.desc: A fresh and sweet traditional dish. Cleanly bisected shrimp is laid over rice and shaped with your bare hands. The springy shrimp meat and the delicious rice highlight the flavor all the more.

list.name: Cristallo di Electro
list.desc: A power-rich crystal that draws electricity from the air around it. Holding it makes your hand a little numb.

list.name: Fotokamera
list.desc:
A convenient tool that records and saves images upon use.
A special item from Fontaine that can record images. People and places to remember must come aplenty for a Traveler roaming the world.

list.name: Lettera dal profumo delicato
list.desc: You obtained this from an infantryman at the Kanjou Commission. They say that this was written personally by the young lady of the Hiiragi Clan.

list.name: Pomodoro
list.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

list.name: La principessa delle nevi e i sei nani (I)
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (I)_icon.png
list.desc: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This is part one, which tells the story of the Land of Night and the Moonlight Forest.

list.name: La principessa delle nevi e i sei nani (III)
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (III)_icon.png
list.desc: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of the Pale Princess and the Light Prince's decision to save the Moonlight Forest.

list.name: La principessa delle nevi e i sei nani (II)
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (II)_icon.png
list.desc: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of the meeting of the Pale Princess and the Light Prince.

list.name: La principessa delle nevi e i sei nani (V)
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (V)_icon.png
list.desc: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. In this installment, the Six Pygmies' sinister scheme starts to unfold.

list.name: La principessa delle nevi e i sei nani (VI)
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (VI)_icon.png
list.desc: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. This installment tells of how the Six Pygmies managed to implement their nefarious plot.

list.name: La principessa delle nevi e i sei nani (IV)
list.iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/The Pale Princess and the Six Pygmies (IV)_icon.png
list.desc: A fairytale story that has been told throughout Teyvat for ages. Installment four describes the meeting between the Pale Princess, the Light Prince, and the Six Pygmies.

list.name: Studi idrologici di Byakuyakoku
list.desc: Un libro sulla geografia e l'idrologia di Byakuyakoku. A causa della chiusura dei fondali e dell'emigrazione della gente di Watatsumi, con il passare degli anni questo libro è diventato inutile.

list.name: Stufato di carne e verdure
list.desc: A meat and vegetable stew. The thick juices taste great with the tender meat and vegetables.

list.name: Sorgente in pietra bianca Calore traboccante
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Whitestone Hot Spring: Diffusing Warmth.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Ravanello
list.desc: Rich in fiber and nutrients. Easy to grow and harvest.

list.name: Pezzo di ferro bianco
list.desc: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

list.name: Sigillo del consenso
list.desc: A token lent out from "Childe" of the Fatui. Normally, the people of Liyue only hold rituals to worship the adepti in the peripheral areas of Jueyun Karst; however, he who holds this token may safely enter the residence of the adepti.

list.name: Sale
list.desc: A savory seasoning. A precise but adequate amount will elevate the quality of the cuisine.

list.name: Pace e prosperità
list.desc: Ganyu's specialty. The image of a resting qilin is by itself enough to calm a person down. Ganyu has put her well-wishes for all that is lovely in this world into this dish — and she's saved some of her favorite Qingxin Flowers just for you, too.

list.name: Ratatouille di Barbatos genuina
list.desc: La specialità di Venti. Gli ingredienti sono gli stessi del piatto tradizionale, tranne per l'aggiunta di alcune Cecilie. Se la si assaggia attentamente, si può percepire il sapore di "un vento che porta speranza e piccoli capricci del destino". Forse... è proprio quello che vuole.

list.name: Coltello sacrificale dell'ispettore
list.desc: In the hands of its lord, this fierce weapon has handled many "debts." No one has eyes in the back of their heads, and this weapon and its related techniques are designed around that weakness.

list.name: Incisioni su pietra: Vol. I
list.desc: A history book compiled and translated from ancient stone tablets of Liyue by the historian Zichang. It contains various fragmented historical events.

list.name: Fontanella a forma di coppa in pietra
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Stone Cup-Shaped Pool.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Frammento d'osso fossilizzato
list.desc:
A fossilized bone fragment sometimes found after defeating Geovishaps.
Geovishaps all dream of growing into great dragons one day. They see these fossils as dragon bones and greatly cherish them, perhaps because they too hope to attain the dragons' longevity and power.

list.name: Cor Lapis
list.desc: Un cristallo prezioso condensato di Geo che si forma in concomitanza con altri minerali. Conosciuto comunemente anche come "Cor Petrae".

list.name: Maschera danneggiata
list.desc:
Una maschera d'osso danneggiata che un tempo apparteneva a un Hilichurl.

Rotta oltre ogni possibilità di riparazione, non può più svolgere la sua funzione primaria.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Paramano antico
list.desc:
Un'elsa usurata dalle battaglie. Una volta si trovava su una spada di Inazuma.

Per gli esperti nell'arte della spada, la tsuba è una forma di difesa dal filo della lama dell'avversario. Per i principianti, è una protezione per la mano destra, per difenderla da sé stessa.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Accessorio spezzato
list.desc: A small accessory you got from Kokomi. It seems to be the fragment of another object. According to her, it might come in handy at some point.

list.name: Vaso di porcellana rinforzato
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Hardened Glazed Vase.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Ferro stellare
list.desc: One of the ores required to create Wonder Cores. It has the power to resonate with Visions.

list.name: Sogni infranti: Chiaro di luna
list.desc: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

list.name: Sogni infranti: Vetro di cristallo
list.desc: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

list.name: Sogni infranti: Cuore di pietra
list.desc: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

list.name: Sogni infranti: Zaffiro
list.desc: A collection of fantasy stories centered around a mysterious antique shop. It's widely popular around Teyvat.

list.name: Olio essenziale granitico
list.desc:
Grants greater affinity for Geo, boosting Geo DMG.
You can feel the fine Geo pellets within when applied. It's said to help with physical injuries.

list.name: Sinfonia sacra
list.desc: Fischl's specialty. The exquisite presentation doth seem to communicate some incomprehensible enigma. When partaking, if one were to gaze upon Fischl, one might see her expectant gaze peek through the gaps of her fingers, which she is using to cover half her face... Is this also part of the mystery?

list.name: Unguento santificatore
list.desc:
Artifact EXP material. Gives 2,500 EXP.
Material that contains the distilled essence of great power. It can contribute to the enhancement of artifacts.

list.name: Essenza santificatrice
list.desc:
Artifact EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Artifacts are themselves the physical manifestation of ideals and memories. Materials such as this, which contain the distilled essence of the power thereof, can make these memories and ideals clearer and stronger still.

list.name: Guida alla purificazione del Sakura sacro
list.desc: A tattered scroll containing information related to the Sacred Sakura Cleansing Ritual. Some pages seem to bear the cinnabar seal of some shrine.

list.name: Camera secondaria del santuario Al servizio di tutti
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Shrine Annex: Pleased to Serve.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Corridoio del santuario Cammino dei petali di sakura
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Shrine Corridor: Sakura-Dusted Path.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Corridoio del santuario Sguardo vermiglio
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Shrine Corridor: Vermilion Gaze.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Sala del santuario Dolci desideri
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Shrine Hall: Gentle Wishes.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Pietra misteriosa
list.desc:
This object seems to carry the Ishine Script that was once used on Tsurumi Island.
Bring this stone back to its rightful place.

list.name: Briglia divina
list.desc: A symbol of the Sunchild's authority, made in the shape of a bridle. It does not possess any special power by itself.

list.name: Leggenda dell'alabarda distrutta (I)
list.desc:
In ancient times when Axis Mundi was unobstructed, there were nine realms, each a world of its own. The realm of humans was known as the Zhongzhou, while the gods reside in Shenxiao.
At the end of the last calamity, a war between the gods broke out. The God King fell, setting the nine realms ablaze, obliterating all living things. The realms have now been born anew, life again thrives, but the passageway between the nine realms by Axis Mundi has been sealed off.
An all-new graphic novel on the epic journey in search of the God-King's Halberd begins!

list.name: Leggenda dell'alabarda distrutta (III)
list.desc:
"Just stay with the name 'Weiyang' for convenience's sake on the road. With the official documents from the government in hand, you should be free to go as you wish throughout the kingdom." Still worried about Weiyang, Mir decided to accompany her on her journey and kill any demons they may encounter.
Though they had already collected five Ominous Swords and all seemed to be well, they knew in their hearts that the way forward would only get more treacherous and perilous.

list.name: Leggenda dell'alabarda distrutta (II)
list.desc: Mir, having stumbled onto the journey to retrieve the swords by accident, encountered a huge crisis before the journey had even begun. Imperial Guard and Imperial Escort elites were slain by enemies holding the Ominous Swords. Amidst grave danger, Mir recalled a spell taught by his father. Legend has that, the Celestial Emperor has a young daughter whose name was not known to the world; she now possessed Weiyang's body and revealed herself. Who would prevail? The wielders of the Ominous Swords who had turned into ferocious demons? Or Mir who could somewhat hold his own in a fight?

list.name: Leggenda dell'alabarda distrutta (V)
list.desc:
"There are many among the military officials who wish to unseal Axis Mundi since the world in chaos would greatly elevate the position and importance of the Martial Artists."
"They want to wage another War of the Asuras?"
"He does."
The tug-of-war between the civil and military officials and the schemes of the past gods once again threatens all of the nine realms!

list.name: Leggenda dell'alabarda distrutta (VI)
list.desc:
Mir once again chanted the forgotten spell. The maiden was reunited with him again. "So, this is what you truly look like."
"The world is beyond repair. It shall be born anew from the ashes of the last." The mad Celestial Emperor sentenced all living things of the world to a harsh punishment.
"But you, you would understand me, wouldn't you?" The nameless thief who stole the national treasure said to his lord.
"No. No apologies necessary, for you are benevolent."

list.name: Leggenda dell'alabarda distrutta (IV)
list.desc:
"Calm down, my son. Listen, Mir. I am not your real father..."
"Noooooo!"
The once Minister of Imperial Banquets was, in truth, Khan the Asura from Jotunheim. Leaving the capital was but an act in collaboration with the Minister of Ceremonies and the Grand Secretary to protect the daughter of the Celestial Emperor.
"The late Celestial Emperor Shenxiao, the now Contra Mundi, was once a dear friend of mine. But now, knowing that you have successfully summoned her, all my wishes have been fulfilled."

list.name: Banco del Festival Bizzarre meraviglie
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Festival Booth - "Strange Wonders."
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Banco del Festival Talento letterario
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making a Festival Booth - "Literary Talent."
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Scrigno del sacerdote
list.desc:
Uno scrigno con un motivo decorativo nella parte inferiore. L'ornamento sembra essere costituto da un disegno in tre parti. Una volta completato, potrebbe aprire una porta da qualche parte.

"Credevo che i giovani crescessero forti e robusti come i cipressi."

"Ma questi cipressi stanno per appassire. La loro voce non verrà più trasportata dal vento. Le aspettative che avevo verso di loro, così come la fiducia che loro ripongono in me, svaniranno del tutto."

"Ancora una volta scalo questa vetta alla ricerca di una guida. Quando sarò tornato giù, mia figlia avrà sicuramente finito il secondo dipinto."

"Fintantoché nel terzo sarà presente lo sciogliersi della neve e del ghiaccio, andrà tutto bene."

list.name: Lacrime della divinità catastrofica
list.desc:
Una parte della marionetta ottenuta dal Piano dell'eutimia. Ha la forma del funesto Occhio del giudizio tempestoso.
Dal momento che sono in grado di scatenare sia maledizioni che catastrofi con un semplice sguardo, sembrerebbe naturale incolpare le divinità catastrofiche per le disgrazie della tua vita. Tuttavia, se ci pensi un po' meglio, se la tua volontà è abbastanza forte e le tue convinzioni sono abbastanza salde...
Le catastrofi vanno avanti da troppo tempo. Anche un occhio nefasto dev'essere bagnato dalle lacrime.

list.name: Pergamena maledetta
list.desc: Una pergamena raffigurante immagini antiche. Si dice che pochi siano in grado di decifrare il suo significato, e che i pochi studiosi che ci sono riusciti siano impazziti tutti.

objectType: Materiale di potenziamento armi e personaggi

list.name: Udon di Fukuuchi
list.desc: La specialità di Yae Miko. Il tofu fritto impiegato è preparato appositamente dalla solenne Lady Kitsune. Si dice che, se lo mangi tutto in una volta con cuore sincero, otterrai la protezione della Grande Kitsune: saluta la sventura, perché la fortuna arriverà in abbondanza!

list.name: Pollame
list.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

list.name: Subrosium
list.desc: One of the ores required to create Wonder Cores. It can often be found where dawn meets dusk.

list.name: Gulasch
list.desc: Hot stew made from Chilled Meat and vegetables chopped into small pieces. Slow-boiled tomatoes give this dish a rich and thick texture. Filling one's stomach with this comforting mixture has a warming effect.

list.name: Ultime parole d'Inaba Tousaburou Kyuuzou
list.desc: A letter filled with words from margin to margin. Its author has gone missing.

list.name: Casa di Inazuma Unità
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Mansion: As One.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Negozio di Inazuma Gemme infinite
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Store: Numberless Gems.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Chiave del Santuario delle Profondità d'Inazuma
list.desc:
A key that can break the seal on the ancient Shrines of Depths scattered around Inazuma.
These Shrines of Depths sealed themselves off when the civilization that built them was lost. Keys lost deep within domains are able to break the seals. Or perhaps that, for a moment, these keys help the seals to forget all that they have lost.

list.name: Residenza ufficiale di Inazuma Stretta conformità
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Official Residence: Strict Adherence.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Residenza ufficiale di Inazuma Maestosità
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Official Residence: Forcefulness.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Bottega di Inazuma Regolarità esaustiva
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Workshop: Exhaustive Regularity.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: bottega di Inazuma Dolce ricerca
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Workshop: Sweetness Sought.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Bottega di Inazuma Polivalente
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Workshop: Multipurpose.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Casa di Inazuma Abitazione di coralli
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Home: House of Coral.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Casa di Inazuma Il frutto di molte generazioni
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Home: The Work of Generations.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Casa di Inazuma Dimensioni comuni
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Home: Routine Dimensions.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Home: Watatsumi Reminiscence.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Casa di Inazuma Cambiamenti semplici
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Home: Easy Adaptation.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Casa di Inazuma Metallo sferragliante
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Home: Clanking Metal.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Casa di Inazuma Lungimiranza insostituibile
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Home: Irreplaceable Foresight.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.

list.name: Casa di Inazuma Dimora della tempesta
list.desc:
A detailed step-by-step blueprint for making an Inazuman Home: Stormhouse.
After using this item, you can view it in the Creation Screen.
